                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>মধ্য বিন্দু&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-7-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>17</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>18</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>9</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-59" style="width: 11.027em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.018em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.518em, 1008.94em, 3.568em, -999.998em); top: -2.785em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-60"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-61" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-62" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-63" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-64"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-65"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.723em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.6em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.818em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-66"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-67" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-68" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-69" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">17</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-70" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.72em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.723em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-71" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-72" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.723em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.6em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.818em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-73"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-74" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-75" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-76" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">18</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-77" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.72em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.723em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-78" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-79" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-80" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-81" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-82"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-83" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-84" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-85" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-86" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">8</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-87" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.789em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>17</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>18</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>9</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-7">=\left(\frac{1+17}{2},\frac{2-18}{2}\right)=\left(9,-8\right)</script></span></p>

<p>অপর বিন্দুদ্বয়,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-8-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-88" style="width: 9.018em;                                                 <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-14-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>26</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>28</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-182" style="width: 4.92em; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-18-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>16</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-221" style="width: 8.773em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.174em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1007.13em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-222"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-223"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-224" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-225" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-226" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-227" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.527em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1003.36em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.719em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-228"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-229" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-230" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-231" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-232" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-233" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">16</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-234" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-235" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-236" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1003.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 3.527em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-237" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-238" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-239" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>16</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-18">x_1=\frac{3\times2-16\times1}{2}=-5</script></span>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-19-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>16</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>11</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>11</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-240" style="width: 14.305em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.723em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1011.64em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-241"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-242"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-243" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-244" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-245" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-246" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.527em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1003.36em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.719em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-247"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-248" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-249" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-250" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-251" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-252" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">16</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-253" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-254" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-255" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1003.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 3.527em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-256" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-257" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">11</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-258" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-259" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">P</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-260" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-261" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-262" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-263"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-264" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-265" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-266" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-267" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">11</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-268" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>16</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>11</mn><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>11</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-19">\rm y_1=\frac{3\times2+16\times1}{2}=11 \therefore P\ \left(-5,11\right)</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 3</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-20-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>36</mn><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-269" style="width: 10.248em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.385em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.269em, 1008.38em, 2.759em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-270"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-271"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.896em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.45em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-272" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.449em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-273" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-274" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-275" style="padding-left: 0.225em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.114em; margin-left: 0.114em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.392em, 1000.67em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -4.395em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.333em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-276" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">36</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.355em, 1000.63em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.575em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.296em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-277"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.635em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.579em, 1000.3em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-278" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.171em; left: 0.337em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-279" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.859em, 1000.82em, 1.157em, -999.998em); top: -1.265em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.6px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.045em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-280" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-281" style="padding-left: 0.263em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.896em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.45em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-282" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.449em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-283" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-284" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.753em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1001.31em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-285" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">cos</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 1.343em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-286" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-287"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-288" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-289"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-290" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-291" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.543em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.684em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>36</mn><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mi>θ</mi></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-20">r^2-\frac{36}{r^2}=r^2\cos^2{2\theta}</script></span>&nbsp;পোলার বক্ররেখাটি কার্তেসীয় স্থানাঙ্কে নিচের কোন বিন্দু দিয়ে যায়?&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-25-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>36</mn><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>36</mn><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-329" style="width: 16.232em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-347"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-348" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-349"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-350" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-351" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-352" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-356" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.641em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1001.23em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-357" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">sin</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 1.232em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-358" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-359"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-360" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-361"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-362" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-363" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-364" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-365" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-366" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">36</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.605em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-367"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.617em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-368" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.219em; left: 0.33em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-369" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.597em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.702em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>36</mn><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>36</mn><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-25">r^2-\frac{36}{r^2}=r^2\cos^2{2\theta}\Rightarrow r^2\sin^2{2\theta}=\frac{36}{r^2}</script></span>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-26-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mn>6</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mn>3</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-370" style="width: 21.846em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 17.912em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1017.87em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-371"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-372" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-373" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-374" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-375" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-376" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-377"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-378" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-379"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-380" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-381" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-382" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-383" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">±</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-384" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-385" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-386" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-387" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-388" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-389" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-390"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-391" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-392"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-393" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-394" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">cos</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-395"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-396" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-397"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-398" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-399" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-400" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">±</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-401" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-402" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-403" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-404" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-405" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-406" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">±</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-407" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>±</mo><mn>6</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>±</mo><mn>3</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>±</mo><mn>3</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-26">\Rightarrow r^2\sin{2\theta}=\pm6\Rightarrow r^2\sin{\theta}\cos{\theta}=\pm3\Rightarrow xy=\pm3</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 4</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>পোলার সমীকরণ,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-27-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>36</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-408" style="width: 10.881em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.906em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1008.87em, 2.796em, -999.998em); top: -2.345em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-409"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-410"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.896em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.45em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-411" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.449em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-412" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-413" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-414" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-415"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-416" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-417" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-418" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">5</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-419" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.395em; left: 1.231em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-421" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-422"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-423" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-424"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-425" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-426" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-427" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-428" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">36</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.349em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.452em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.593em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>36</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-27">r^2\left(4+5\sin^2{\theta}\right)=36 </script></span>&nbsp;নির্দেশ করে একটি-</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-28-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>36</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>9</mn><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>36</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-429" style="width: 16.805em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.773em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1013.73em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-430"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-431" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-432"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-433" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-434" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-435" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-436" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-437"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-438" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-439" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-440" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.641em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1001.23em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-441" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">sin</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 1.232em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-442" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-443"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-444" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-445"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-446" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-447" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-448" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">36</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-449" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-450" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-451"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-452" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-453" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-454" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-455" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">9</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-456"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-457" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-458" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-459" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-460" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">36</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>36</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>9</mn><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>36</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-28">4r^2+5r^2\sin^2{\theta}=36\Rightarrow4x^2+9y^2=36</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-29-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>9</mn><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>36</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-461" style="width: 14.633em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.969em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.74em, 1011.89em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-462"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-463" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-464" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-465"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-472" style="font-size: 70.7%; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-474" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">36</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-475" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-476" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-487" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-488" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>9</mn><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>36</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-29">\Rightarrow4x^2+9y^2=36\Rightarrow\frac{x^2}{9}+\frac{y^2}{4}=1</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-34-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>|</mo><mtable rowspacing=&quot;4pt&quot; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-561" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-562" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-563" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-564" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-565" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 6</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-35-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0394;</mi><mi>A</mi><mi>B</mi><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-569" style="width: 3.802em; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.957em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>a</mi><mi>b</mi><mi>c</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-37">abc</script></span>&nbsp;এবং ভরকেন্দ্রটি&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-38-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>y</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-625" style="width: 0.598em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.486em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.678em, 1000.49em, 2.573em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-626"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-627" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.866em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>y</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-38">y</script></span> অক্ষের উপর অবস্থিত না হলে, নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-42-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>b</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>c</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>b</mi><mi>c</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>b</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>c</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>a</mi><mi>b</mi><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-659" style="width: 17.707em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.51em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.781em, 1014.47em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-660"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-661"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.117em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1002.99em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.514em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-662"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-663"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-664" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.26em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-665" style="font-size: 50%;
