font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-670" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-671"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.617em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-672" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.26em; left: 0.289em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-673" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-674" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1003.12em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 3.117em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-675" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-676" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-677" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">b</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-678" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-679" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-680" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-681" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-682" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-683" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-684" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-685" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">b</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-686" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-687" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-688" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-689" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-690" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-691" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-692" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-693" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-694" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">b</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-695" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-696" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-697" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.852em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>b</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>c</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>a</mi><mi>b</mi><mi>c</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>b</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>c</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>a</mi><mi>b</mi><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-42">\frac{a^3+b^3+c^3}{3}=abc\Rightarrow a^3+b^3+c^3-3abc=0</script></span>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-43-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>{</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>b</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>b</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>c</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>c</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>a</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>}</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-698" style="width: 21.6em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 17.707em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.518em, 1017.67em, 3.568em, -999.998em); top: -2.785em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-699"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-700" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-701" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-702" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-703"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-704" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-705" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-706" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-707" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-708" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">c</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-709" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-710" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-711" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">{</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-712"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-713"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.363em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1002.83em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-714"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-715" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-716"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-717" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-718" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-719" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">b</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-720" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.912em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-721" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-722" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-723" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.281em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1002.75em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-724"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-725" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-726"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-727" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-728" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-729" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">c</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-730" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.83em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-731" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-732" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-733" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.363em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1002.83em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-734"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-735" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-736"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-737" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-738" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-739" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">a</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-740" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.953em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-741" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-742" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">}</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-743" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-744" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.789em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>{</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>b</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>b</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>c</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>c</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>a</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>}</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-43">\Rightarrow\left(a+b+c\right)\left\{\left(a-b\right)^2+\left(b-c\right)^2+\left(c-a\right)^2\right\}=0 </script></span>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Again,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-44-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2260;</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi><mo>&amp;#x2260;</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-745" style="width: 12.461em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.207em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.74em, 1010.17em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-746"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-747"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.117em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.363em, 1002.91em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.588em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.473em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-748"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-749" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-750" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-751" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-752" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-753" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-754" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-755" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-756" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-757" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1003.12em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 3.117em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-758" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≠</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-759" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-760" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-761" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-762" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-763" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-764" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-765" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-766" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≠</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-767" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>≠</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi><mo>≠</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-44">\frac{2(a+b+c)}{3}\neq0\Rightarrow a+b+c\neq0</script></span>&nbsp;</p>

<p>So,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-45-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>c</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-768" style="width: 4.1em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.363em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1003.36em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-769"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-770" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-771" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-772" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-773" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-774" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">c</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>c</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-45">a=b=c</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 7</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>&nbsp;কোনো বিন্দুর কার্তেসীয় স্থানাঙ্ক&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-46-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-775" style="width: 4.212em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.43em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.977em, 1003.24em, 3.988em, -999.998em); top: -3.24em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-776"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-777"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-778" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-779"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-780" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-781" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-782" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.082em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.114em; margin-left: 0.114em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.392em, 1000.3em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -4.395em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.184em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-783" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1000.93em, 4.212em, -999.998em); top: -3.5em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.482em;"><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-784"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.933em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.392em, 1000.34em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0.598em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-785"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-786" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.971em, 1000.34em, 1.194em, -999.998em); top: -1.675em; left: 0.598em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.035em; border-top: 1.2px solid; width: 0.337em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.045em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.318em, 1000.6em, 4.249em, -999.998em); top: -4.022em; left: 0em;"><span><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.859em, 1001.08em, 1.157em, -999.998em); top: -1.265em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.6px solid; width: 1.082em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.045em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-787" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">)</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.243em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.816em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.275em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-46">\left(1,\frac{1}{\sqrt3}\right)</script></span>&nbsp;হলে বিন্দুটির&nbsp;পোলার স্থানাঙ্ক কত?&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-47-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>60</mn></mrow><mi>o</mi></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-788" style="width: 4.192em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-51-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>r</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>30</mn></mrow><mi>o</mi></msup></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-850" style="width: 18.609em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.248em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.518em, 1015.25em, 3.568em, -999.998em); </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 8</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি ত্রিভুজের শীর্ষবিন্দুত্রয়ের পোলার স্থানাঙ্ক যথাক্রমে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-52-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>6</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-895" style="width: 7.379em;                                             <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-55-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-936" style="width: 3.736em;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>শীর্ষত্রয়&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-58-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>;</mo><mo>&amp;#x2206;</mo><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>|</mo><mtable rowspacing=&quot;4pt&quot; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 9</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>&nbsp;একটি ত্রিভুজের শীর্ষত্রয় যথাক্রমে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-59-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>6</mn><mi>a</mi><mo>,</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>b</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>b</mi><mo>,</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>c</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1043" style="width: 9.801em;                                                 <span class="fas fa-check"></span>

</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 10</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি ত্রিভুজের দুইটি শীর্ষ&nbsp;(1, 5)&nbsp;ও&nbsp;(5, 1)&nbsp;। অপর শীর্ষ&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-67-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>19</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1189" style="width: 5.591em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.585em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1004.55em, 2.573em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1190"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1191" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1192" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1193" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.225em;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1194" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1195" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">19</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>19</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-67">x+y=19</script></span>&nbsp;রেখায় অবস্থান করে। ত্রিভুজটির ক্ষেত্রফল কত বর্গ একক?&nbsp;</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-68-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>|</mo><mtable rowspacing=&quot;4pt&quot; </span>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 11</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-69-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>15</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1257" style="width: 8.981em;                                             </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-72-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>5</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1284" style="width: 0.64em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.503em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1000.46em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1285"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1286" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.947em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>5</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-72">5 </script></span></p>

                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-75-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>|</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>15</mn></mrow><msqrt><msup><mn>4</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt></mfrac><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>25</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1296" style="width: 8.814em; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1321" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1322" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1323" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.117em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.948em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.502em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>|</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>15</mn></mrow><msqrt><msup><mn>4</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt></mfrac><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>25</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-75">\left|\frac{4+6+15}{\sqrt{4^2+3^2}}\right|=\frac{25}{5}=5 \therefore</script></span>&nbsp;প্রতিবিম্বের দূরত্ব&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1325"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1326" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1327" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; </span>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 12</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-77-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1332" style="width: 11.477em; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.523em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1340" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.452em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.548em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>3</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-77">3\left(p^2-q^2\right)x+6y=7</script></span>&nbsp;এবং&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-78-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>18</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>21</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1352" style="width: 13.005em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.658em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1010.58em, 2.796em, -999.998em); top: -2.345em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1353"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1354" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1355" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1356" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1357"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1358"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.933em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.49em, 4.287em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1359" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.523em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1360" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1361" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1362" style="padding-left: 0.225em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.933em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.45em, 4.287em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1363" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.523em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1364" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1365" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1366" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1367" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1368" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1369" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">18</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1370" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1371" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1372" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">21</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.349em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.452em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.548em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>3</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>18</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>21</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-78">3\left(p^2+q^2\right)\ x+18y=21</script></span>&nbsp;সমীকরণ দুটি একই সরলরেখা প্রকাশ করলে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-79-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>p</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1373" style="width: 0.635em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.523em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.678em, 1000.52em, 2.535em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.27em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.866em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>p</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-79">p</script></span> ও <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-80-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>q</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1376" style="width: 0.561em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-84-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msup><mi>p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>7</mn><mn>21</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><msup><mi>p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1410" style="width: 20.863em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 17.092em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.822em, 1017.05em, 2.912em, -999.998em); font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1433"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1434" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.219em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1435" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1485" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1486" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1487" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1488" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.797em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msup><mi>p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>7</mn><mn>21</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>∴</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><msup><mi>p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>P</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-84">\frac{3\left(p^2-q^2\right)}{3\ \left(\ p^2+q^2\right)}=\frac{7}{21}=\frac{1}{3}\therefore\frac{p^2-q^2}{p^2+q^2}=\frac{1}{3}\Rightarrow\frac{2P^2}{2q^2}=\frac{4}{2}=2</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-85-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi>p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2026;</mo><mo>&amp;#x2026;</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1489" style="width: 9.018em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.379em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1007.3em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1490"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1491" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1492" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1493" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1494" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1495" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1496" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1497"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.45em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1498" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1499" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1500" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">…</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1501" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">…</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1502" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1503" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1504" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi>p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>…</mo><mo>…</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>i</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-85">\Rightarrow p^2=2q^2\ldots\ldots(i)</script></span>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-86-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1505" style="width: 0.945em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1000.78em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1506"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1507"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1508" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1509" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-86">p^2</script></span>&nbsp;ও&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-87-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1510" style="width: 0.945em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1000.78em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1511"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1512"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.45em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1513" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1514" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-87">q^2</script></span>&nbsp;এর মান যথাক্রমে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-88-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1515" style="width: 0.535em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.412em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1000.37em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1516"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1517" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>4</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-88">4</script></span>&nbsp;ও&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-89-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1518" style="width: 0.535em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.412em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1000.37em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1519"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1520" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.903em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-89">2</script></span>&nbsp;ধরলেও (i) নং সিদ্ধ হয়।&nbsp;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-90-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msup><mi>p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>p</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1521" style="width: 18.158em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.879em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1014.88em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1522"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1523" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1524" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1525" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1526" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1527" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1528" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1529" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1530" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">p</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1531" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1532" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">±</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1533" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1534" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1535" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1536"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.45em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1537" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1538" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1539" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1540" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1541" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1542" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1543" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1544" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1545" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">±</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-1546" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1547"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1548" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.49em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><msup><mi>p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>p</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>±</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msup><mi>q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>±</mo><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-90">\therefore p^2=4\Rightarrow p=\pm2,\ q^2=2\Rightarrow q=\ \pm\sqrt2</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>প্রদত্ত রেখাদ্বয় পরস্পর সমান্তরাল হওয়ায়,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-93-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>d</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>17</mn></mrow><mn>13</mn></mfrac><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>32</mn><mn>13</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2.46</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1571" style="width: 10.904em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.936em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.682em, 1008.89em, 3.281em, -999.998em); top: -2.744em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1572"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1573" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">d<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1574" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1575" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1576" style="vertical-align: 0.945em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.289em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -3.277em; left: 0em;">∣<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -2.908em; left: 0em;">∣<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1577"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.625em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1002.5em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.268em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1578"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1579" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1580" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1581" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1582" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1583" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">17</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1584" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">13</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.62em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.625em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1585" style="vertical-align: 0.945em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.289em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -3.277em; left: 0em;">∣<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -2.908em; left: 0em;">∣<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1586" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1587" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1588" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">32</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1589" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">13</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1590" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1591" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2.46</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.748em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.547em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>d</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>17</mn></mrow><mn>13</mn></mfrac><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>32</mn><mn>13</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2.46</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-93">d=\left|\frac{3\times5+17}{13}\right|=\frac{32}{13}=2.46</script></span>&nbsp;একক</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-100-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>b</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>30</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>30</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>60</mn><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1654" style="width: 13.814em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.314em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1011.27em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1655"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1656"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1657" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1658" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1659" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1660"><span style="display: inline-block;
