<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-101-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1678" style="width: 2.502em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.051em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.314em, 1001.97em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1679"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1680" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1681" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1682" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1683" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1684" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mo>−</mo><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-101">\therefore\left(-\right)</script></span>&nbsp;চিহ্নযুক্ত সমীকরণটি সূক্ষ্মকোণের সমদ্বিখণ্ডের সমীকরণ হবে।&nbsp;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-102-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><msqrt><msup><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>6</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>6</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><msqrt><msup><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>6</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>11</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1685" style="width: 19.018em; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 15</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-103-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2206;</mo><mi>A</mi><mi>B</mi><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1739" style="width: 3.802em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.094em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1003.09em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1740"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1741" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Δ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1742" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1743" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">B</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1744" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.039em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∆</mo><mi>A</mi><mi>B</mi><mi>C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-103">∆ ABC</script></span>&nbsp;এর&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-112-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>A</mi><mo>&amp;#x2261;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>11</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>13</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1826" style="width: 29.469em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 24.141em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1024.06em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1827"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1828" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1829" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≡</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1830" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1831" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1832"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1833"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1834" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1835" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; </span>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-118-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>12</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>37</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1935" style="width: 7.516em; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1942" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1943" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>None</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-120-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>28</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>14</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>21</mn><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>9</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>18</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>54</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1988" style="width: 15.822em; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1997" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">21</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1998" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-121-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>37</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>75</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2007" style="width: 7.42em;                         <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 17</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিম্নের কোন রেখাটি&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-122-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2017" style="width: 7.975em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.522em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.269em, 1006.49em, 2.684em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2018"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2019" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2020" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2021" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.225em;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2022" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2023" style="padding-left: 0.263em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.486em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.114em; margin-left: 0.114em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.392em, 1000.3em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -4.395em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.184em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2024" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.392em, 1000.34em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.649em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.184em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2025" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.859em, 1000.49em, 1.157em, -999.998em); top: -1.265em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.6px solid; width: 0.486em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.045em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2026" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2027" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2028" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.593em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-122">x-y=\frac{1}{2}y-2</script></span>&nbsp;ও&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-123-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>y</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2029" style="width: 9.465em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-130-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>k</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2089" style="width: 14.674em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.01em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1011.97em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2090"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2091" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2092" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2093" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2094" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2095" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2096" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2097" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2098" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2099" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">k</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2100" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2101" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2102" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2103"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2104" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2105" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2106" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2107" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2108" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2109" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2110" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2111" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2112" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2113" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>k</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-130">2x-3y+4+k\ \left(3x+3y-5\right)=0</script></span>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-131-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>k</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2114" style="width: 16.928em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.855em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1013.81em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2115"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2116" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2117" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2118" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2119"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2120" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2121" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2122" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2123" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2124" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2125" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2126" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2127" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2128" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2129" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2130"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2131" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2132" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2133" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2137" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2138" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2139" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2140" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2141" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2142" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2143" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>k</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>k</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-131">\Rightarrow\left(3k+2\right)\ x+\left(3k-3\right)y-5k+4=0</script></span>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-132-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>y</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2144" style="width: 1.477em; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-133-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>k</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2148" style="width: 10.33em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-134-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2163" style="width: 21.15em; top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2164"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2165" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2166" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2182" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2183" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-135-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2195" style="width: 3.977em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2196"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2197" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2198" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2199" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2200" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2201" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2202" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-135">\Rightarrow x=\frac{1}{5}</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 18</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>y-axis এর সাথে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-145-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>60</mn></mrow><mi>o</mi></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2301" style="width: 1.753em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.418em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1001.42em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2302"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2303"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.418em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.206em, 1000.97em, 4.137em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2304"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2305"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2306" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">60</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.395em; left: 1.008em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2307" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>60</mn></mrow><mi>o</mi></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-145">{60}^o</script></span>&nbsp;কোণ উৎপন্ন করে এমন রেখার উপর অঙ্কিত লম্ব রেখা যা&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-146-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2308" style="width: 2.684em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.2em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1002.09em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2309"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2310" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2311" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2312" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2313" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2314" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.32em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-146">(1,2)</script></span>&nbsp;বিন্দুগামী, তা মূলবিন্দু হতে কত লম্ব দূরত্বে অবস্থান করবে?</p>

                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>লম্ব রেখার সমীকরণ,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-151-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2349" style="width: 7.461em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.109em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1006.03em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2350"><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-2351"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2352"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2353" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.49em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2354" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2355" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2356" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2357" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2358" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2359" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2360" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2361" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>;</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-151">\sqrt3x+y+k=0;</script></span>&nbsp;যা&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-152-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2362" style="width: 2.461em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.01em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1001.93em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2363"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2364"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2365" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2366"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2367" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2368" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2369" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2370" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2371" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-152">\left(1,\ 2\right)</script></span>&nbsp;বিন্দুগামী।&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-153-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2372" style="width: 8.977em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.338em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1007.3em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2373"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2374" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-2375" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2376"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2377" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.49em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2378" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2379" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2380" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2381" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-2382" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.49em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2385" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2386" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-153">\therefore\sqrt3x+y=\sqrt3+2</script></span>।&nbsp;</p>

<p>মূলবিন্দু হতে লম্বের দূরত্ব&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-154-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2387" style="width: 9.264em;                                     <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 19</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-155-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2414" style="width: 5.591em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-155">y=3x+7</script></span>&nbsp;এবং&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;                                         <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 2.297em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2508" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.24em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 20</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-170-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>p</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>q</mi><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2611" style="width: 8.199em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.708em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1006.67em, 2.573em, -999.998em);                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-175-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>p</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>q</mi><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2658" style="width: 6.723em; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2668" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>p</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>q</mi><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-175">px+qy+c=0</script></span>&nbsp;এর ঢাল&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-176-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mi>p</mi><mi>q</mi></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2669" style="width: 2.625em; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2673"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-177-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>m</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>n</mi><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2676" style="width: 7.215em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.904em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1005.86em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2677"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2678" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2679" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2680" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2681" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2682" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2683" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2684" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2685" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2686" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>m</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>n</mi><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-177">mx+ny+b=0</script></span>&nbsp;এর ঢাল&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-178-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mi>m</mi><mi>n</mi></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2687" style="width: 2.871em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.338em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.34em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2688"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2689" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2690" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2691"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.74em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2692" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2693" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.74em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.74em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mi>m</mi><mi>n</mi></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-178">=-\frac{m}{n}</script></span></p>

<p>শর্তমতে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-179-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi>p</mi><mi>q</mi></mfrac><mfrac><mi>m</mi><mi>n</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>p</mi><mi>m</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>q</mi><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2694" style="width: 12.215em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.002em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1009.96em, 2.584em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2695"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2696"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2697" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.33em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2698" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2699"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.74em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2700" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2701" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.74em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.74em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2702" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2703" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2704" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2705"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2706" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2707" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2708" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2709" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2710" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2711" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2712" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2713" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2714" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2715" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2716" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.702em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mi>p</mi><mi>q</mi></mfrac><mfrac><mi>m</mi><mi>n</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>p</mi><mi>m</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>q</mi><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-179">\frac{p}{q}\frac{m}{n}=\left(-1\right)\Rightarrow pm+qn=0</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 21</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-183-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>b</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>c</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>c</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>b</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2748" style="width: 22.625em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 18.527em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1018.45em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2749"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2750"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2751" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2752"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2753"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2754" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2755" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2756"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2757" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2758" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2759" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2760" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2761" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">b</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2762" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block;                         <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 22</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি চতুর্ভূজের চারটি বাহুর সমীকরণ যথাক্রমে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-185-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2868" style="width: 10.769em; top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2869"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2870" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; padding-left: 0.263em;">0</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2873" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2874" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2875" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2876" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2877" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2878" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">5</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2879" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2880" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2881" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2882" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2883" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2884" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.263em;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-185">y=0\ ,\ y=5\ ,\ y=x</script></span>&nbsp;এবং&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-186-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2885" style="width: 5.032em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.1em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1004.06em, 2.573em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2886"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2887" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2888" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2889" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.263em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2890" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2891" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">4</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-186">y=x-4</script></span>&nbsp;হলে, চতুর্ভূজটির ক্ষেত্রফল কত বর্গ একক?</p>

                                        </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 150px; height: 123px;"></p>

<p>চতুর্ভূজটি একটি সামান্তরিক, যার ভূমি&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-187-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2892" style="width: 0.535em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.412em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1000.37em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2893"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2894" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>4</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-187">4</script></span>&nbsp;এবং উচ্চতা&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-188-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>5</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2895" style="width: 0.535em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.412em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1000.37em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2896"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2897" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>5</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-188">5</script></span>&nbsp;একক।&nbsp;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-189-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2898" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2899"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2900" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-189">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;সামান্তরিকটির ক্ষেত্রফল&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-190-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>20</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2901" style="width: 5.617em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.592em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1004.55em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2902"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2903" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2904" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2905" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2906" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2907" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2908" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">20</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>20</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-190">=4\times5=20</script></span>&nbsp;বর্গ একক</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 23</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-191-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>ln</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>r</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>3</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>ln</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2909" style="width: 20.158em;
