font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.392em, 1000.34em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.649em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.184em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2943" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.859em, 1000.49em, 1.157em, -999.998em); top: -1.265em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.6px solid; width: 0.486em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.045em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2944" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">ln</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2945"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2946" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2947"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2948"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2949" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2950"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2951" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2952"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2953" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2954"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2955" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2956" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2957" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.349em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.498em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.73em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>r</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>3</mn><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-191">\ln{r}=\frac{r^3}{3}\left(\sin{3\theta}+\sin^3{\theta}\right)-\frac{1}{2}\ln{\left(\sin{2\theta}\right)}</script></span>&nbsp;সমীকরণের কার্তেসীয় রূপ হচ্ছে-</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-196-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>ln</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3028" style="width: 19.305em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.822em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.945em, 1015.66em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.047em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3029"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-3030"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3031" style="font-size: 70.7%; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3039" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3040" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3041" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3042"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3043" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3044"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3045" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3046" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3047" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3048" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-3049" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.74em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3050"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.617em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3051" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.26em; left: 0.33em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3052" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3053" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.74em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 1.232em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3067" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3068"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3069" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3070"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3071" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3072" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3073" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.641em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 1.232em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3075" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3076"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3077" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3078"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3079" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3080" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-196">\frac{1}{2}\ln{(r^2\sin{2\theta})}=\frac{r^3}{3}\left(3\sin{\theta}-4\sin^3{\theta}+\sin^3{\theta}\right)</script></span>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-197-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>ln</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3081" style="width: 16.027em; top: -2.047em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3082"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3083" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-3084" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3087" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">ln</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3088"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3089" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3090"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3091"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3092" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3093"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3094"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3108" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3109" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3110"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3111" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3112"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3113" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3114"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3115" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3116" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3120"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3121" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3122"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3123" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3124" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-197">\Rightarrow\frac{1}{2}\ln{\left(r^2\sin{2\theta}\right)}=r^3\left(\sin{\theta}-\sin^3{\theta}\right)</script></span>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-198-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>r</mi><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>.</mo><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3125" style="width: 14.797em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.133em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1012.13em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.047em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3126"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3127" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3128" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">ln</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3129"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3130" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3131"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3132"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3133" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3134"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3135"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3138" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3139"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3140" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3141"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3142" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3143" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3144" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3145" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3146" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3147" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3148" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">sin</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3149"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3150" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3151"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3152" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3153" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3154" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 1.355em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3159" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3160"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3161" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3162"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3163" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>r</mi><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>.</mo><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-198">\Rightarrow\ln{\left(r^2\sin{2\theta}\right)}=2r\sin{\theta}.r^2\cos^2{\theta}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-199-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>y</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mi>y</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3164" style="width: 14.469em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.846em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1011.85em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3165"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3166" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3167" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">ln</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3168"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3169" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3170"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3171"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3172" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3173"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3174" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3175" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3176" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3177" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3178" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3179" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3180" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3181"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3182" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3183" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3184" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3185" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3186" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3187" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3188" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3189" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.969em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3190" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-3191"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3192"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3193" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3194" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-3195"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3196" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.26em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3197" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>y</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>2</mn><mi>y</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-199">\Rightarrow\ln{\left(2xy\right)}=2yx^2\Rightarrow2xy=e^{2yx^2} </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-5-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><msup><mn>150</mn><mi>o</mi></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-46" style="width: 4.465em; </label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-6-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>r</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-55" style="width: 7.871em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-63" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-7-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>tan</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>y</mi><mi>x</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>t</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>n</mi><msup><mn>150</mn><mi>o</mi></msup><mo>,</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x3B8;</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>150</mn><mi>o</mi></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-70" style="width: 16.682em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-95" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-96" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-97"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-98" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-99" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 1.518em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-102" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: -0.747em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>y</mi><mi>x</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>t</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>n</mi><msup><mn>150</mn><mi>o</mi></msup><mo>,</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>θ</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>150</mn><mi>o</mi></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-7"> \tan{\theta}=\frac{y}{x}=-\frac{1}{\sqrt3}=tan150^o,θ=150^o</script></span>&nbsp;&nbsp;[ কারণ&nbsp;2<sup>nd</sup> quadrant&nbsp;এ অবস্থিত]</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 25</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-16-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>12</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-192" style="width: 8.981em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.342em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1007.3em, 2.573em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-193"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-194" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-195" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-196" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-197" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-198" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-199" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-200" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">12</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-201" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-202" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>3</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>12</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-16">3y+4x-12=0 </script></span>&nbsp;সরলরেখা দ্বারা x&nbsp;এবং&nbsp;y&nbsp;অক্ষের মধ্যকার খন্ডিত অংশের দৈর্ঘ্য কত?</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-17-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>12</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>y</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>;</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-203" style="width: 17.871em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.633em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1014.59em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-204"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-205" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-206" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-207" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-208" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-209" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-210" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-211" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">12</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-212" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-213" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-214" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-215" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-216" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-217" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-218" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-219" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-220" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-221" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-222" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-223" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.166em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-224" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-225" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-226" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-227" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-228" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-229" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-230" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-231" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>12</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>y</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>;</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-17">4x+3y=12 \Rightarrow\frac{x}{3}+\frac{y}{4}=1; a=3,\ \ b=4 	</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-18-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-232" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-233"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-234" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-18">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;দৈর্ঘ্য&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-19-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-235" style="width: 6.805em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.576em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1005.53em, 2.215em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-236"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-237" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-238" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-242" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-243" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-244" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-246" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1003.03em, 3.895em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-247" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-248" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 26</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি ত্রিভুজের তিনটি শীর্ষবিন্দুর স্থানাঙ্ক&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-20-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><msubsup><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>2</mn><mi>a</mi><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><msubsup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>2</mn><mi>a</mi><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-249" style="width: 12.744em; width: 0px; height: 2.349em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.452em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.548em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><msubsup><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>2</mn><mi>a</mi><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><msubsup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>2</mn><mi>a</mi><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-20">\left(at_1^2,\ 2at_1\right),\ \left(at_2^2,\ 2at_2\right)</script></span>&nbsp;এবং&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-21-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>a</mi><msubsup><mi>t</mi><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>2</mn><mi>a</mi><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-285" style="width: 5.777em;                                             <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-25-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-354" style="width: 8.108em; t_1+t_2+t_3=1 
</script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ভরকেন্দ্র x&nbsp;অক্ষের উপর।&nbsp;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-26-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>a</mi><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>a</mi><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>a</mi><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-369" style="width: 19.92em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 16.314em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1016.27em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-370"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-371" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-372" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-373" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-374" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-375" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-376" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.084em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1004.96em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.506em; left: 50%; margin-left: -2.457em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-377"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-378" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-379" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.248em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-382" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-383" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-384" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-385" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-386"><span style="display: inline-block; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">t</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.891em; left: 0.248em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-388" style="font-size: 50%; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-404" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">t</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-405" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-406" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-407" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.781em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-408" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">t</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-409" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-410" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-411" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>∴</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>a</mi><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>a</mi><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>a</mi><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-26">\therefore y=0\therefore\frac{2at_1+2at_2+2at_3}{3}=0\Rightarrow t_1+t_2+t_3=0</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>

                        </div>

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 27</span></div>

                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>AB&nbsp;রেখার মধ্যবিন্দু&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-43-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2261;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-562" style="width: 8.895em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.297em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.518em, 1007.13em, 3.568em, -999.998em); top: -2.785em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-563"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-564"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-565" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-566"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-567"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.23em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-568"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-569" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-570" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-571" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-572" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-573" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-574" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.23em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-575"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-576" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-577" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-578" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-579" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-580" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-581" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≡</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-582" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-583" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-584"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-585" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-586" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-587" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-588" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-589" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: 0px; height: 2.789em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.847em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>≡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-43">\left(\frac{1+3}{2},\frac{1+4}{2}\right)\equiv\left(2,\frac{5}{2}\right)</script></span></p>

<p>AC&nbsp;রেখার মধ্যবিন্দু&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-44-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2261;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-591" style="width: 10.33em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.445em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1008.28em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.047em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-592"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-593"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-594" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-595"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-596"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.23em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-597"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-598" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-599" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-600" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-601" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-602" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-603" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-604"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.23em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-605"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-606" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-607" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-608" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-609" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; padding-left: 0.289em;">≡</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-612" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-613" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-614"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-615" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-616" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-617" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-620" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-621" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-622" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>≡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-44">\left(\frac{1+5}{2},\ \frac{1-2}{2}\right)\equiv\left(3,\ -\frac{1}{2}\right)  </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-45-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-623" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-624"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-625" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-45">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;ঢাল&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-46-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-626" style="width: 6.6em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.412em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.494em, 1005.37em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-627"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-628" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-629" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -1.227em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-630"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-631" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-632"><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -0.121em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-633" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.37em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.227em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>                        
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 28</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি সরলরেখা অক্ষদ্বয় হতে সমমানের যোগবোধক অংশ ছেদ করে। মূলবিন্দু হতে রেখাটির লম্ব দূরত্ব 6&nbsp;একক হলে, রেখাটির সমীকরণ হবে -</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-62-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-799" style="width: 7.789em;
