padding-left: 0.23em;">6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-807" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-808" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.331em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-62"> x+2y-6=0 </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-63-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi>x</mi><mi>a</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>y</mi><mi>a</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>&amp;#x2026;</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-809" style="width: 12.953em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.617em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1010.53em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-810"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-811"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-812" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-813" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-814" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-815" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-816" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-817" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-818" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-819" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-820" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-821" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-822" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-823" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-824" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-825" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-826" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">…</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-827" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-828" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-829" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mi>x</mi><mi>a</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi>y</mi><mi>a</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>…</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>i</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-63">\frac{x}{a}+\frac{y}{a}=1\Rightarrow x+y=a\ldots(i)</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-64-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-830" style="width: 2.461em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-831"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-832"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-833" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-834"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-835" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-836" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-837" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-838" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-839" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-64">\left(0,\ 0\right) </script></span>&nbsp;হতে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-65-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>a</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-840" style="width: 4.182em; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-844" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-845" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-846" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>a</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-65">x+y=a </script></span>&nbsp;রেখার দূরত্ব 6&nbsp;একক।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-66-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>a</mi></mrow><msqrt><msup><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt></mfrac><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-847" style="width: 18.404em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.084em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.764em, 1015.08em, 3.977em, -999.998em); top: -3.113em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-848"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-849" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-850" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-851" style="vertical-align: 1.232em;"><span style="display: inline-block; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -2.293em; left: 0em;">∣<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-852"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 2.584em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1001.85em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.699em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-860"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-861"><span style="display: inline-block; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-863" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-864" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-865"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.71em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -2.293em; left: 0em;">∣<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-869" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-870" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-871" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-872" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-873" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-874" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-875"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-876"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-877" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.49em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-878" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-879" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-880" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-881" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-882" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-883" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-884"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-885"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-886" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.49em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.117em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.948em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.502em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>−</mo><mi>a</mi></mrow><msqrt><msup><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt></mfrac><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><mo>∴</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-66">\therefore\left|\frac{0+0-a}{\sqrt{1^2+1^2}}\right|=6\Rightarrow a=6\sqrt2\therefore x+y=6\sqrt2 </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 29</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-67-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-887" style="width: 7.193em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 120px; height: 132px;"></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-69-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0394;</mi><mi>D</mi><mi>E</mi><mi>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-917" style="width: 27.051em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 22.174em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1022.13em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-918"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-919" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Δ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-920" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">D</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-921" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-922" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-923" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-924" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-925" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-926" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-927"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-928" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-929"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-930" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-931" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-932" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-933" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-934" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-935" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-936" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">8</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-937" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-938" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-939" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-940" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-941" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-942" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-943" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-944" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-945" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-946" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-947" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-948" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-949" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-950" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">8</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-951" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-952" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-953" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-954" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-955" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">8</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>D</mi><mi>E</mi><mi>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-69">\Delta DEF=\frac{1}{2}\left(1\times4+4\times8+2\times2-2\times4-4\times2-8\times1\right)=8</script></span>&nbsp;বর্গ একক</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-70-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0394;</mi><mi>A</mi><mi>B</mi><mi>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0394;</mi><mi>D</mi><mi>E</mi><mi>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>32</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-956" style="width: 11.518em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.428em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1009.39em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-957"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-958" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-959" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">Δ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-960" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-961" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">B</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-962" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-963" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-964" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-965" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Δ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-966" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">D</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-967" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">E<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-968" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-969" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-970" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">32</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>A</mi><mi>B</mi><mi>C</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>D</mi><mi>E</mi><mi>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>32</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-70">\therefore\Delta ABC=4\Delta DEF=32 </script></span>&nbsp;বর্গ একক</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 30</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 160px; height: 108px;"></p>

<p>চিত্রে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-71-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>A</mi><mi>P</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>P</mi><mi>B</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-971" style="width: 5.292em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.324em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1004.32em, 2.349em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-972"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-973" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-974" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">P<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.114em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-975" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-976" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.263em;">P<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.114em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-977" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">B</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.957em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>A</mi><mi>P</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>P</mi><mi>B</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-71">AP=PB </script></span>&nbsp;হলে&nbsp;PQ&nbsp;রেখার সমীকরণ-</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-72-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>16</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-978" style="width: 9.019em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-76-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>P</mi><mo>&amp;#x2261;</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>4</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1020" style="width: 4.346em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.568em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1003.49em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1021"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1022" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">P<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1023" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≡</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1024" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1025" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1026" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1027" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1028" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>P</mi><mo>≡</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>4</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-76">P\equiv(1,4) </script></span></p>

<p>&nbsp;AB&nbsp;রেখার সমীকরণ,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-77-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>11</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>.</mo><mo>.</mo><mo>.</mo><mo>.</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1029" style="width: 15.945em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.076em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1012.99em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1030"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1031"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.27em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.654em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1032"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1033" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1034" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1035" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.23em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1036"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1037" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1038" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1039" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.44em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1040" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1041" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.23em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1042"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1043" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1044" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1045" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1046" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1047" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1048" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1049" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1050" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1051" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1052" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1053" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">11</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1054" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1055" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1056" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1057" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">.</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1058" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">.</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1059" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">.</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1060" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1061" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1062" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.547em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.852em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>11</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>.</mo><mo>.</mo><mo>.</mo><mo>.</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>i</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-77">\frac{x-4}{4+2}=\frac{y-5}{2} \Rightarrow x-3y+11=0 .... (i)</script></span></p>

<p>(i)&nbsp;এর উপর লম্ব এবং&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-78-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>4</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1063" style="width: 2.215em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.805em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1001.72em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1064"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1065" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1066" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1067" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1068" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1069" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>4</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-78">(1,4) </script></span>&nbsp;বিন্দুগামী রেখার সমীকরণ,</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-79-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1070" style="width: 15.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.83em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1012.79em, 5.535em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1071"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.83em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1006.27em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1072" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1073" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1074" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1075" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1076" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1077" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1078" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1079" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1012.79em, 4.223em, -999.998em); top: -2.703em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-1080" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1081" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1082" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1083" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1084" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1085" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1086" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1087" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1088" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1089" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1090" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1091" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1092" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1093" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1094" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1095" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">7</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -1.748em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>∴</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>7</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-79"> 3x+y+k=0\\
\therefore3\times1+4+k=0 \therefore k=-7   
</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-80-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>P</mi><mi>Q</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1096" style="width: 2.502em; top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1097"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1098" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1099" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>P</mi><mi>Q</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-80">\therefore PQ </script></span>&nbsp;রেখা,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-81-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1101" style="width: 6.314em; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 31</span></div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>সমান্তরাল রেখার সমীকরণ,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-87-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>12</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1204" style="width: 7.256em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.945em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1005.9em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1205"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1206" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">12</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1207" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1208" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1211" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1212" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1213" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1214" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>12</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-87">12x-5y+c=0</script></span></p>

<p>প্রদত্ত রেখা&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-88-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>12</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1215" style="width: 5.617em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.592em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1004.59em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1216"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1217" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">12</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1218" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1219" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1220" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1221" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1222" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1223" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">7</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>12</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-88">12x-5y=7</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-89-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>c</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow><msqrt><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>12</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt></mfrac><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>c</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow><mn>13</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mn>12</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>33</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1224" style="width: 26.682em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 21.846em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(4.223em, 1021.8em, 9.059em, -999.998em); left: 0em;"><span><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Size1;">√</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 3.035em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1245" style="vertical-align: 1.232em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.289em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -3.277em; left: 0em;">∣<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -2.293em; left: 0em;">∣<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1246" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1247" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1248" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1249" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">±</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1250"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.314em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.19em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1251"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1252" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1253" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1254" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">7</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1255" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">13</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.31em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.314em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1256" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1257" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1021.8em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-1258" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1259" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1260" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1261" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1262" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">7</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1263" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1264" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">±</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1265" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">26</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1266" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1267" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1268" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1269" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">19</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1270" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1271" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1272" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">33</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1273" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1274" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">12</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1275" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1276" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1277" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1278" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1279" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1280" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">19</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1281" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1282" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1007.79em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -0.859em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-1283" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1284" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">12</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1285" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1286" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1287" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1288" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1289" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1290" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">33</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1291" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1292" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 5.576em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -4.147em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 5.702em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>c</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow><msqrt><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>12</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt></mfrac><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mo>±</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>c</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow><mn>13</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>c</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>=</mo><mo>±</mo><mn>26</mn><mo>∴</mo><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>19</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>33</mn><mo>∴</mo><mn>12</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>19</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mn>12</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>33</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-89">\therefore\left|\frac{c+7}{\sqrt{{12}^2+5^2}}\right|=2\Rightarrow\pm\frac{c+7}{13}=2 \\\Rightarrow c+7=\pm26
\therefore c=19,-33   \therefore12x-5y+19=0 \\
 12x-5y-33=0
</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">

padding-left: 0.23em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1423" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1424" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.331em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>7</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-101">
7x-3y-2=0 
</script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>লম্বের সমীকরণ:&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-102-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>7</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1425" style="width: 7.133em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.822em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1005.58em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1426"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1427" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">7</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1428" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1429" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1430" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1431" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1432" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1433" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1434" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1435" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1436" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>7</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-102">7x-3y+k=0\ </script></span>&nbsp;যা&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-103-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1437" style="width: 2.461em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.01em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1001.93em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1438"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1439"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1440" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1441"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1442" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1443" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1444" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-104-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>11</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mn>7</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>11</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1447" style="width: 24.797em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 20.33em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1020.29em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1448"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1449" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1450" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">7</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1451" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1452" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1453" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1454" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1455" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1456" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1457" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1458" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1459" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1460" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1461" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1462" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1463" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1464" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1465" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1466" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1467" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">11</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1468" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1469" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">7</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1470" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1471" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1472" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1473" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1474" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1475" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">11</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1476" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1477" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>−</mo><mn>11</mn><mo>∴</mo><mn>7</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>11</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-104">\therefore7\times2-3\times1+k=0\Rightarrow\ k=\ -11  \therefore7x-3y-11=0</script></span></p>
</span>

padding-left: 0.23em;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.331em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-108">
y+3=x-3 </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">C</span>

y+3=x-1 </script></span></p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 180px; height: 119px;"></p>

<p>A ও B এবং এর মধ্যবিন্দু,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-111-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>C</mi><mo>&amp;#x2261;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1540" style="width: 5.371em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.387em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1004.3em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1541"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1542" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1543" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≡</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1544" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1545" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1546"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1547" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1548" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1549" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1550" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1551" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1552" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>C</mi><mo>≡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-111">C\equiv\left(-4,\ 3\right)</script></span></p>

<p>AB<!--[if gte msEquation 12]><m:oMath><span
