<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-113-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>C</mi><mi>D</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1579" style="width: 2.83em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.297em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1002.05em, 2.379em, -999.998em); display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-114-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1585" style="width: 5.207em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-115-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>C</mi><mi>D</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1598" style="width: 2.584em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.092em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1002.05em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1599"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1600" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1601" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1602" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">D</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>C</mi><mi>D</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-115">\therefore CD </script></span>&nbsp;রেখার সমীকরণ:&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-116-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>16</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1603" style="width: 13.773em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.273em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1011.23em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1604"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1605" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1606" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1607" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1608" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1609" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1610" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1611" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1612" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1613" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1614" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1615" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1616" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1617" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1618" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1619" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1620" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1621" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">16</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1622" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1623" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>16</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-116">y=\frac{1}{4}x+4\ \Rightarrow\ x-4y+16=0</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 35</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-117-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1624" style="width: 6.336em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.181em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.269em, 1005.18em, 2.759em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1625"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1626" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1627" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1628" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1629" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1630" style="padding-left: 0.225em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.418em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.114em; margin-left: 0.114em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.392em, 1000.3em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -4.395em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.184em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1631" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.392em, 1001.27em, 4.175em, -999.998em); top: -3.649em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.669em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1632"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1633" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1634" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1635" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.859em, 1001.42em, 1.157em, -999.998em); top: -1.265em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.6px solid; width: 1.418em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.045em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.543em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.639em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-117">y=1+\frac{1}{2+x} </script></span>&nbsp;&nbsp;রেখা x অক্ষকে A ও y অক্ষকে B বিন্দুতে ছেদ করলে, AB রেখার সমীকরণ–</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>Putting y = 0 in&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-121-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1666" style="width: 5.248em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.305em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1004.3em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1667"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1668" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1669" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1670" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1671" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1672" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1673" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.27em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.654em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1674"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1675" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1676" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1677" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.44em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.547em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-121">y=1+\frac{1}{2+x}</script></span>,&nbsp;we get&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-122-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2013;</mo><mn>3</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1678" style="width: 2.83em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.297em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1002.26em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1679"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1680" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1681" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1682" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1683" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>–</mo><mn>3</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-122">x = –3   </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-123-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>A</mi><mo>&amp;#x2261;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1684" style="width: 6.314em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.166em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.314em, 1005.08em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1685"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1686" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1687" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">A</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1688" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≡</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1689" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1690" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1691"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1692" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1693" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1694" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1695" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1696" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1697" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>A</mi><mo>≡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-123">\therefore A\equiv\left(-3,\ 0\right)</script></span>&nbsp;</p>

<p>Putting x = 0 in&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-124-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1698" style="width: 5.535em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.51em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1004.26em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1699"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1700" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1701" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1702" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1703" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1704" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1705" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.27em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.654em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1706"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1707" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1708" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1709" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.44em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1710" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.547em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-124">y=1+\frac{1}{2+x}\ </script></span>,&nbsp;we get&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-125-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>B</mi><mo>&amp;#x2261;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1711" style="width: 8.568em; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1714" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1715" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; padding-left: 0.289em;">≡</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1721" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1722" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1723"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1724" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1725" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1726" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1727" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1728" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1729" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>∴</mo><mi>B</mi><mo>≡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-125">y=\frac{3}{2} \therefore B\equiv\left(0,\frac{3}{2}\right)</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-126-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>A</mi><mi>B</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1730" style="width: 2.461em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.01em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1002.01em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1731"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1732" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1733" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1734" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">B</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>A</mi><mi>B</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-126">\therefore  AB</script></span>&nbsp;এর সমীকরণ:&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-127-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1735" style="width: 6.314em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.166em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1005.12em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1736"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1737" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1738" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1739" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1740" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1741" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1742" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1743" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1744" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-127">x-2y+3=0</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 36</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-128-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1745" style="width: 2.833em;                                 <div class="row questionOptions">
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>45°</p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>

                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">

                                                <span class="input-group-text">B</span>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>

</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-134-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1849" style="width: 4.829em;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 38</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-138-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1929" style="width: 6.224em;                                 <div class="row questionOptions">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-144-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>a</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>b</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow><mn>15</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>7</mn></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>7</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1996" style="width: 15.781em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">b</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.31em, 1.191em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2010" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2011" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.027em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.9em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2012"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2013" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2014" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">7</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2015" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">15</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.03em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2016" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2017" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2018" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2019" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2020" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.23em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2021"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2022" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2023" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">10</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2024" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">7</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2025" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2026" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2027" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2028" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2029" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2030" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2031" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2032" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2033" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">7</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.597em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>a</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>b</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow><mn>15</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>7</mn></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>7</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-144">\frac{2}{3a}=\frac{3}{-5b}=\frac{-7}{15}\Rightarrow\ a=\frac{-10}{7}\ ;\ \ b=\frac{9}{7} </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
                            <h4>Engineering Daily Practice Exam</h4>
                        </div>

                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-7-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-61" style="width: 13.076em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.699em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1010.66em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-62"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-63"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.19em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-64"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-65" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-66" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-67" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.23em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-68"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-69" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-70" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-71" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-72" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-73" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.27em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.654em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-74"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-75" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-76" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-77" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.44em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-82" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-83" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-84" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-85" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-86" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-87" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-88" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-89" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-90" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-91" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.547em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.852em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-7">\frac{y-1}{1-4}=\frac{x-1}{1-3}\Rightarrow3x-2y-1=0 </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 40</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-12-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>4</mn><msqrt><mn>13</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-134" style="width: 2.416em; </label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">

position: relative; width: 2.174em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1001.07em, 4.51em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-216"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-217"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-218" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">16</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1001.19em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.875em; left: 0.986em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: -0.08em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-222" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1001.31em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.523em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.654em;"><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-223"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.314em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-224"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-225" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">13</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1000.7em, 1.232em, -999.998em); top: -1.678em; left: 0.576em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.039em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.62em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.44em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-226" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 7.748em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -7.447em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 8.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mrow><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mi>α</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mrow><mi>s</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>α</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mi>p</mi></mfrac><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mrow><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>α</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mrow><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>α</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>16</mn><msup><mi>p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mn>13</mn><mn>1</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>16</mn><msup><mi>p</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo>∴</mo><mi>p</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mn>16</mn><mn>13</mn></mfrac></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>4</mn><msqrt><mn>13</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-13">2x+3y=4 \\ \therefore\frac{2}{cos\alpha}=\frac{3}{sin\alpha}=\frac{4}{p} \\ \Rightarrow\frac{4}{\cos^2{\alpha}}=\frac{9}{\sin^2{\alpha}}=\frac{16} {p^2}\Rightarrow\frac{13}{1}=\frac{16}{p^2}\\ \therefore p=\sqrt{\frac{16}{13}}=\frac{4}{\sqrt{13}}\ </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 41</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

</label>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-19-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>r</mi><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>r</mi><mi>sin</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-306" style="width: 15.125em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-307"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-308" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-309" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-317" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.07em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 42</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p style="text-align: justify;"><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-20-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-337" style="width: 10.285em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.422em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1008.35em, 2.573em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-338"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-339" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-340" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-341" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-342" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-343" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-344" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-345" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-346" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-347" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-348" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-349" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-350" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-351" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-20">x=0,\ x=4,\ y=1</script></span> এবং <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-21-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-352" style="width: 2.833em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.312em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1002.27em, 2.573em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-353"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-354" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-355" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-356" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-21">y=5</script></span> রেখাগুলি দ্বারা আবদ্ধ এলাকার ক্ষেত্রফল কত বর্গ একক?</p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="height: 92px; width: 120px;"></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-26-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-371" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-372"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-373" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-26">\therefore</script></span> ক্ষেত্রফল <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-27-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-374" style="width: 4.059em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.322em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1003.24em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-375"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-376" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-377" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-378" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-379" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-380" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-381" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>4</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-27">=(4\times4)</script></span> বর্গ একক =16 বর্গ একক</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 43</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-28-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-382" style="width: 5.591em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.585em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1004.55em, 2.573em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-383"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-384" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-385" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-386" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-387" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.225em;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-388" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-389" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-28">3x-y=0</script></span> রেখার সাথে:<br>
(i) y-অক্ষের কোণ <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-29-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>cot</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>3</mn></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-390" style="width: 3.653em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.982em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1002.95em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-391"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-392"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.312em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.243em, 1001.27em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-393" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">cot</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 1.343em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-394"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-395"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-396" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-397" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-398"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-399" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-400"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-401" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>cot</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>3</mn></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-29">\cot^{-1}{3}</script></span><br>
(ii)&nbsp;y=3 রেখার কোণ <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-30-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>cot</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-402" style="width: 3.877em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.169em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.269em, 1003.17em, 2.722em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-403"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-404"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.312em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.243em, 1001.27em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-405" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">cot</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 1.343em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-406"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-407"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-408" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-409" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-410"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-411" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-412"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-413"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.486em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.114em; margin-left: 0.114em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.392em, 1000.3em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -4.395em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.184em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-414" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.392em, 1000.34em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.649em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.184em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-415" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.859em, 1000.49em, 1.157em, -999.998em); top: -1.265em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.6px solid; width: 0.486em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.045em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.498em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.593em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>cot</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-30">\cot^{-1}{\frac{1}{3}}</script></span><br>
(iii) লম্ব রেখার ঢাল <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-31-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-416" style="width: 0.859em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.71em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.269em, 1000.71em, 2.722em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-417"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-418"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.486em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.114em; margin-left: 0.114em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.392em, 1000.3em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -4.395em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.184em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-419" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.392em, 1000.34em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.649em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.184em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-420" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.859em, 1000.49em, 1.157em, -999.998em); top: -1.265em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.6px solid; width: 0.486em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.045em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.498em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.593em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-31">\frac{1}{3}</script></span><br>
<strong>নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?</strong></p>

                                        </div>
