                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-32-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-421" style="width: 7.502em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.15em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1006.07em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-422"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-423" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-424" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-425" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-426" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-427" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-428" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-429" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-430" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-431" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-32">y=3x\Rightarrow m=3,</script></span> &nbsp;<br>
∴ লম্ব রেখার ঢাল <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-33-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi>i</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-432" style="width: 6.027em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.92em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1004.84em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-433"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-434" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-435" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-436"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-437" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-438" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-439" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-440" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-441" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-442" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-443" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-444" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>i</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>i</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-33">=-\frac{1}{3}\Rightarrow(iii)</script></span> ভুল।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 44</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-34-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>12</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-445" style="width: 6.82em;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-35-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi>x</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mi>y</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-454" style="width: 4.879em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-455"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-456"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-457" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-458" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-459" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-460" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-461" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-462" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-463" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-464" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-465" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mi>x</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mi>y</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-35">\frac{x}{4}-\frac{y}{3}=1\  </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 45</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-540" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-541" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-542" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-543" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-544" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-545" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-546" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-547" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-548" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mi>a</mi></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>∴</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-43">2\left(-\frac{3}{a}\right)=-1 &nbsp;\therefore a=6</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 46</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p style="text-align: justify;">একটি ত্রিভুজের ভরকেন্দ্র <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-44-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-549" style="width: 3.02em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-51-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mspace linebreak=&quot;newline&quot; /><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>17</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-619" style="width: 11.395em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.346em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1009.35em, 6.395em, -999.998em); top: -4.096em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-620"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.346em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.953em, 1008.4em, 4.51em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-621"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.338em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1002.17em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.105em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-622"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-623" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-624" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-625" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-626" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-627" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-628" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.34em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.338em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-629" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-630" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-631" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-632" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-633" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-634" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.912em, 1009.35em, 4.51em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-635" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-636"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.83em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1002.71em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.35em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-637"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-638" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-639" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-640" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-641" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-642" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-643" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-644" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.83em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.83em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-645" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-646" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-647" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-648" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-649" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-650" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">17</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.1em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>17</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-51">\frac{0+4+x}{3}=3\Rightarrow x=5&nbsp;\\
\frac{-5+0+y}{3}=4\Rightarrow y=17 &nbsp;</script></span><br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-52-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-651" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-652"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-653" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-52">\therefore</script></span> ৩য় শীর্ষবিন্দুর স্থানাঙ্ক&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-53-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>17</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-654" style="width: 2.953em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.42em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1002.34em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-655"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-656"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-657" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-658"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-659" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-660" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-661" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-662" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">17</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-663" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>17</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-53">\left(5,\ 17\right)&nbsp;</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 47</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-66-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-893" style="width: 7.118em; </label>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-71-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>5</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-932" style="width: 2.234em; </label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">

clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.95em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.523em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-1010"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1011"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1012" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1000.37em, 1.232em, -999.998em); top: -1.678em; left: 0.576em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.039em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.371em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.62em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1013" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1014" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-1015"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1016"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1017" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.49em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1018" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 5.576em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -4.798em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 5.702em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mi>d</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>c</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>c</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><msqrt><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt></mfrac><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><msqrt><msup><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt></mfrac><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>4</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-72">x-y-2=0 \\
x-y+2=0 \\
d=\left|\frac{c_1-c_2}{\sqrt{a^2+b^2}}\right|=\left|\frac{-2-2}{\sqrt{1^2+1^2}}\right|=\frac{4}{\sqrt2}=\frac{2\times2}{\sqrt2}=2\sqrt2\  </script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-84-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>15</mn></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mn>0</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1117" style="width: 20.453em; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 49</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p style="text-align: justify;">x-অক্ষের সমান্তরাল এবং <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-85-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1182" style="width: 7.118em;                                             </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-89-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1210" style="width: 2.871em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.325em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1002.23em, 2.598em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1211"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1212" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1213" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1214" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.331em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-89">y=1</script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-90-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1215" style="width: 4.966em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.055em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.414em, 1004.01em, 2.598em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1216"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1217" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1218" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1219" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1220" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1221" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.331em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.169em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-90">y+1=0</script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>রেখাদ্বয়ের ছেদবিন্দু <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-91-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1222" style="width: 2.461em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.01em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1001.93em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1223"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1224" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1225" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1226" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1227" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1228" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1229" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-91">(1,\ 1)</script></span>&nbsp;<br>
<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-92-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>x</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1230" style="width: 1.559em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1001.23em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1231"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1232" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1233" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>x</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-92">\therefore x</script></span> অক্ষের সমান্তরাল রেখার সমীকরণ&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-93-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1234" style="width: 7.953em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.518em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1006.48em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1235"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1236" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1237" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1238" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1239" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1240" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1241" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1242" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1243" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1244" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-93">y=1\Rightarrow y-1=0</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 50</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-94-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>A</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>B</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1245" style="width: 10.956em; (i) BC বাহুর দৈর্ঘ্য <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-96-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn><msqrt><mn>10</mn></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1277" style="width: 2.982em; (ii) AB বাহুর মধ্যবিন্দুর স্থানাঙ্ক&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-97-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1283" style="width: 4.1em; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.859em, 1000.49em, 1.157em, -999.998em); top: -1.265em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; (iii) <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-98-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x0394;</mi><mi>A</mi><mi>B</mi><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1295" style="width: 3.802em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.094em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1003.09em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1296"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1297" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">Δ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1298" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1299" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">B</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1300" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.039em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>A</mi><mi>B</mi><mi>C</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-98">\Delta ABC</script></span> এর ক্ষেত্রফল 4 বর্গ একক<br>
<strong>নিচের কোনটি সঠিক?</strong></p>

                                        </div>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">
 <div class="row question">  <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 51</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-1-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>,</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1" style="width: 6.708em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.479em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1005.37em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-4" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-5"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-6" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-7" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-8" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: relative; width: 0.289em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -3.277em; left: 0em;">∣<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 4.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>|</mo><mrow><mtable rowspacing="4pt" columnspacing="1em"><mtr><mtd><mi>x</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></mtd><mtd><mn>8</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>4</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></mrow><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>±</mo><mn>20</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-4">\left|\begin{matrix}x\ &8&1\\4&1&1\\-1&-4&1\\\end{matrix}\ \right|=\pm20</script></span></p>

<p>[বিন্দুগুলো ঘড়ির কাঁটার দিকে হলে ক্ষেত্রফল ঋণাত্মক, আর ঘড়ির কাঁটার বিপরীতে হলে ধনাত্মক]</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-5-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>55</mn><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mn>20</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>15</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>7</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-74" style="width: 11.846em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.715em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1009.72em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-75"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-76" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-77" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-78" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-79" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">55</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-80" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-81" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">±</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-82" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">20</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-83" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-84" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-85" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-86" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">15</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-87" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-88" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">7</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>55</mn><mo>=</mo><mo>±</mo><mn>20</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>15</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>7</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-5">5x-55=\pm20\Rightarrow x=15,7</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 52</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-6-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-89" style="width: 17.327em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.197em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1014.16em, 2.573em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-90"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-91" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-92" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-93" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;                                         </div>

</span>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 53</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>নিচের কোন রেখাটি&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-10-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-170" style="width: 8.832em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.23em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1007.19em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-171"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-172" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-173" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-174" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-175"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-176" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-177" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-178" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.225em;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-179" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-180" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-181" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.263em;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-182" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-183" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">6</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.32em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>4</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-10">4\left(x+y\right)=y+6</script></span>&nbsp;ও&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-11-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>7</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-184" style="width: 9.875em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.087em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1007.98em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-185"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-186" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-187" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-188" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-189"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-190" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-191" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-192" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.225em;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-193" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-194" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-195" style="padding-left: 0.263em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-196" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-197"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-198" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">7</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-199" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-12-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>45</mn></mrow><mi>o</mi></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-202" style="width: 1.753em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.418em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1001.42em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-203"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-204"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.418em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.395em; left: 1.008em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-208" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span style="display: inline-block;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>রেখাদ্বয়ের ছেদবিন্দু&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-17-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-244" style="width: 3.035em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.461em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1002.38em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-245"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-246"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-247" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-248"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-249" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-250" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-251" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-252" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-253" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-17">\left(3,-2\right)</script></span>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-18-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>tan</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>45</mn></mrow><mi>o</mi></msup></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>y</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-254" style="width: 17.215em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.1em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.314em, 1014.1em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-255"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-256" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-257" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-258" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-259"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-260" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-261" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-262" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-263" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-264" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-265" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">tan</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-266"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-267" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-268"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-269"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-270"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-271"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-272" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">45</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-273" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-274" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-275" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-276"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-277" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-278" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-279" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-280" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-281" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-282" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-283" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-284" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-285" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-286" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>45</mn></mrow><mi>o</mi></msup></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>y</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-18">\therefore\left(y+2\right)=\tan{{45}^o}\left(x-3\right)\Rightarrow5=x-y</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p>লম্ব রেখার সমীকরণ,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-44-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-579" style="width: 6.846em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.617em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1005.58em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-580"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-581" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-582" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-583" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-584" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-585" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-586" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-587" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-588" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-589" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-44">3x+4y+k=0</script></span>; যা&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-45-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-590" style="width: 2.461em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.01em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1001.93em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-591"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-592"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-593" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-594"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-595" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-596" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-597" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-598" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-599" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-45">\left(3,\ 2\right) </script></span>&nbsp;বিন্দুগামী।&nbsp;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-46-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>17</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-600" style="width: 15.535em;                         <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 55</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>পোলার সমীকরণ,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-48-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>cot</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>&amp;#x22C5;</mo><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>c</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-644" style="width: 9.391em; top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-645"><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-646" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-647" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-648" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;
