                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-49-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>t</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>.</mo><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mi>r</mi><mfrac><mrow><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>r</mi><mi>s</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mi>r</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-662" style="width: 22.379em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 18.322em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1018.32em, 2.584em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-663"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-664" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-665" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-666" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-667" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-668" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">t</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-669" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-670" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-671" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.166em;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-672" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-673" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-674" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-675" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-676" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-677" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-678" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-679"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-680" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-681" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-682" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-683" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">r</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-684"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.805em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.31em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.654em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-685"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-686" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-687" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-688" style="font-size: 70.7%; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1001.68em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.523em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.818em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-690"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-691"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.86em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-692" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">sin</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.863em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-693" style="font-size: 50%; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-698" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-699" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-700" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.527em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1003.03em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-701"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-702" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-703"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-704" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-705" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-706" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-707" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-708" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-709" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 3.117em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-710" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-711" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-712" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-713" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-714" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-715" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-716" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>t</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>.</mo><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mi>r</mi><mfrac><mrow><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>r</mi><mi>s</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mi>r</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mi>θ</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-49">r=cot\theta.cosec\theta\Rightarrow\ r^2=r\frac{cos\theta}{\sin^2{\theta}}\ \Rightarrow\left(rsin\theta\right)^2=rcos\theta</script></span>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-50-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-717" style="width: 4.51em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.691em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1003.61em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-718"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-719" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-720" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-722" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-723" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-724" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-725" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>;</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-50">\Rightarrow y^2=x;</script></span>&nbsp;[<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-51-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2235;</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>r</mi><mi>s</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-726" style="width: 5.166em; top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-727"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-728" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∵</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-729" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-730" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-731" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-732" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-733" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-734" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-735" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-53-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-745" style="width: 2.912em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-746"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-747"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-748" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-749" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-750" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-751" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-53">y^2=x</script></span>&nbsp;পরাবৃত্তের&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-54-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>p</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>r</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>b</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>l</mi><mi>a</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-752" style="width: 4.551em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-753"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-754"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-755" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-756"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-757" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-758" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-759" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-760" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-761" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">b</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-762" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-763" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-764" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-765" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>                      
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 56</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-74-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1089" style="width: 8.348em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.87em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.871em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.597em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>.</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>t</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-79">m_2=-\frac{9}{5}\ .\ \ tan\theta=\frac{m_1-m_2}{1+m_1m_2}</script></span>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-80-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>29</mn><mn>75</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>21.14</mn></mrow><mi>o</mi></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1169" style="width: 12.256em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.043em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1009.8em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.047em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1170"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1171" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1172" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">θ</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1173" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1174" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1175" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.42em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.281em, 1001.44em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1176" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">tan</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 1.436em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1177"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1178"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1179" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1180" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1181"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1182" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1183"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1184"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1185" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1186"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1187" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">29</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1188" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">75</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1189" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1190" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1191" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.707em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1002.26em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1192"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1193"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1194" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">21.14</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 2.297em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1195" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1196" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>θ</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>tan</mi><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>29</mn><mn>75</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>21.14</mn></mrow><mi>o</mi></msup><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-80">\Rightarrow\theta\ =\tan^{-1}{\left(\frac{29}{75}\right)={21.14}^o\ }</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-87-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1243" style="width: 17.502em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.346em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1014.35em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1244"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1245"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.486em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1002.95em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1246"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1247" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1248"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1249" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1250" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1251" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1252" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 3.035em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1253" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1254" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1255" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.404em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1002.87em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1256"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1257" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1258"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1259" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1260" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1261" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1262" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.953em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1263" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1264" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1265" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.486em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1002.95em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1266"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1267" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1268"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1269" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1270" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1271" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1272" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 3.035em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1273" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1274" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1275" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.404em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1002.87em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1276"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1277" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1278"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1279" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1280" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1281" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1282" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.953em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1283" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-87">\left(x-5\right)^2+\left(y-5\right)^2=\left(x+5\right)^2+\left(y+5\right)^2</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-88-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>4.5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4.5</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1284" style="width: 13.65em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.191em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1011.15em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1285"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1286" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1287" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4.5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1288" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1289" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1290" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4.5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1291" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1292" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1293" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1294" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1295" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1296" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1297" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1298" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1299" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>4.5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4.5</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-88">\Rightarrow4.5x+4.5y=0\Rightarrow x+y=0</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 58</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-89-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1300" style="width: 5.33em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.361em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1004.36em, 2.349em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1301"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1302" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1303" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1304" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1305" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">cos</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1306"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1307" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1308"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1309" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.957em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-89">r=2\cos{\theta}</script></span>&nbsp;পোলার বক্ররেখাটির কোন বিন্দু থেকে (1,4)&nbsp;বিন্দুর দূরত্ব 3&nbsp;একক?</p>

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-93-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1337" style="width: 2.735em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.234em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1002.14em, 2.598em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1338"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1339"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1340" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1341"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1342" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1343" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1344" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.184em;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1345" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.331em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.336em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-93">\left(1,1\right) </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-94-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>r</mi><mi>cos</mi><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1346" style="width: 18.527em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.166em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1015.12em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1347"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1348" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1349" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1350" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1351" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">cos</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1352"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1353" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1354"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1355" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1356" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1357" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1358" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1359" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1360" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1361" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1362" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1363" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">cos</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1364"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1365" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1366"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1367" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1368" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1369" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1370" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1371" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1372" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1373" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1374" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1375" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1376" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1377" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1378" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>r</mi><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-94">r=2\cos{\theta}\Rightarrow r^2=2r\cos{\theta}\Rightarrow x^2+y^2=2x</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-95-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1379" style="width: 8.814em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.215em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1007.13em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1380"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1381" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1382" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.486em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1002.95em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1383"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1384" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1385"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1386" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1387" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1388" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1389" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 3.035em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1390" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1391" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1392" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1393" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1394" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1395" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1396" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-95">\Rightarrow\left(x-1\right)^2+y^2=1 </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-96-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1397" style="width: 2.215em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.805em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1001.72em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1398"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1399" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1400" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1401" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1402" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1403" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-96">(1,1) </script></span>&nbsp;বিন্দু থেকে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-97-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1404" style="width: 2.215em; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-98-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1413" style="width: 1.559em;                         </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 59</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-100-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1426" style="width: 6.224em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.106em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1005.07em, 2.573em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1427"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1428" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1429" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1430" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1431" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1432" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1433" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1434" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>4</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-100">4y-3x=3</script></span>&nbsp;এবং&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-101-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1435" style="width: 6.224em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-106-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>b</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>12</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>12</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>24</mn><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1481" style="width: 13.568em; top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1482"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1483"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1485" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1486"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1487" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1493"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1494" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">b</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1495" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1496" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1497" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">12</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1500" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1501" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">24</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1502" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&gt;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1503" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>b</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>12</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>12</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>24</mn><mo>&gt;</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-106">a_1a_2+b_1b_2=12+12=24>0</script></span>;&nbsp;(+)&nbsp;চিহ্নযুক্ত সমীকরণটি স্থূলকোণের সমদ্বিখণ্ডকের সমীকরণ হবে।&nbsp;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-107-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><msqrt><mn>9</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>16</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><msqrt><mn>16</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>9</mn></msqrt></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1504" style="width: 8.895em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.297em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1007.3em, 2.871em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1505"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1506" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1507" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.035em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1002.87em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.473em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1508"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1509" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1510" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1511" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1512" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1513" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1514" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1515" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1002.22em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.564em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.105em;"><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-1516"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.215em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.6em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1517"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1518" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1519" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1520" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">16</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1001.6em, 1.232em, -999.998em); top: -1.678em; left: 0.576em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.039em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 1.6em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.62em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1003.03em, 1.191em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1521" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1522" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1529" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1530" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1002.22em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.564em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.105em;"><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-1531"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.215em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.6em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1532"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1533" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">16</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1534" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1535" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1003.03em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 3.035em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-108-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1536" style="width: 20.699em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 16.969em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1016.93em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1537"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1538" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1539" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; </span>

padding-left: 0.151em;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1753" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1754" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.32em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>p</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>,</mo><mi>q</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>?</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-121">\left(p\ ,q\right)=?</script></span></p>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-126-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1799" style="width: 6.068em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.961em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1004.96em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1800"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1801" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1802" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1803" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1806" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1807" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">9</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1808"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1809" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-126">5x+2y=9a^2</script></span>&nbsp;এর ঢাল,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-127-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1811" style="width: 4.223em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.445em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1003.45em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1812"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1813"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.314em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1816" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1817" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-127">m_1=-\frac{5}{2}</script></span>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-128-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>3</mn><mi>p</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>q</mi><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>27</mn><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1821" style="width: 7.502em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-130-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>q</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>q</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>p</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>q</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1848" style="width: 24.797em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 20.33em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1020.33em, 2.789em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1849"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1850" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1851" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1858" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1859" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1863"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute;
