width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1865" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1866" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1867" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1868"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1869" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1870" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1871"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1872" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1873" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1874" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1875" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1876" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1877" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1878" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1879"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1880" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1881" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1882"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1883" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1884" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1885" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1886" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1887" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1888" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1889" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1890" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1891" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1892" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>×</mo><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>q</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>q</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>p</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>q</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-130">\therefore m_1\times m_2=-1\Rightarrow-\frac{5}{2}\times\frac{3p}{5q}=-1\Rightarrow\frac{3p}{2q}=1\Rightarrow3p=2q</script></span>&nbsp;</p>

<p>এখানে, রেখাদ্বয়&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-131-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1893" style="width: 2.215em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.805em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1001.72em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1894"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1895" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1896" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1897" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1898" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1899" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-131">(1,2)</script></span>&nbsp;বিন্দুগামী।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-132-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1900" style="width: 14.1em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.559em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1011.48em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1901"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1902" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1903" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1904" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1905" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1906" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1907" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1908" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1909" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1911" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1914" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1916" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1917" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1918" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1920" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1921" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>9</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-132">\therefore5+2\times2=9a^2\Rightarrow a^2=\frac{9}{9}=1</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-133-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>p</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>q</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>27</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1923" style="width: 11.559em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-134-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>q</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>10</mn><mi>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>27</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>27</mn><mn>8</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1939" style="width: 12.461em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-135-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>p</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>q</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>27</mn><mn>8</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1956" style="width: 12.83em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.78em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><mi>p</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>q</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>27</mn><mn>8</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-135">\therefore p=\frac{2q}{3}=\frac{2}{3}\times\left(-\frac{27}{8}\right)=-\frac{9}{4}</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-136-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>p</mi><mo>,</mo><mi>q</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>27</mn><mn>8</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1984" style="width: 9.92em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.117em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1007.95em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1985"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1986" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1987" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1988" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1989"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1990" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1991" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1992" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.166em;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1993" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1994" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2002" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2003" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2004" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2005" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2008" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; </span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-140-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>b</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>c</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>c</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>b</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>b</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2049" style="width: 21.805em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-141-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>{</mo><mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>}</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>{</mo><mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow><mo>}</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>{</mo><mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>8</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>}</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>216</mn><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2111" style="width: 29.1em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-142-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2164" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2165"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2166" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-142">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;স্থূলকোণে রয়েছে।</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 62</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-149-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>p</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>q</mi><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2225" style="width: 6.723em; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2233" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2234" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2235" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>p</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>q</mi><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-149">px+qy+c=0</script></span>&nbsp;এর ঢাল&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-150-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mi>p</mi><mi>q</mi></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2236" style="width: 2.625em; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2240"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-151-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>m</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>n</mi><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2243" style="width: 7.215em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.904em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1005.86em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2244"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2245" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2246" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2247" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2248" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2249" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2250" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2251" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">b</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2252" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2253" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>m</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>n</mi><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>b</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-151">mx+ny+b=0</script></span>&nbsp;এর ঢাল&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-152-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mi>m</mi><mi>n</mi></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2254" style="width: 2.871em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.338em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.34em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2255"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2256" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2257" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2258"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.74em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2259" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2260" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.74em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.74em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mi>m</mi><mi>n</mi></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-152">=-\frac{m}{n}</script></span>&nbsp;</p>

<p>শর্তমতে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-153-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi>p</mi><mi>q</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>m</mi><mi>n</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>p</mi><mi>n</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>m</mi><mi>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2261" style="width: 10.166em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.322em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1008.28em, 2.584em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2262"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2263"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2264" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">p</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.33em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2265" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2266" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2267" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.74em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.326em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2268" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2269" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.74em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.74em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2270" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2271" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">p</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2272" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2273" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2274" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2275" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">q<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2276" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2277" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.647em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.702em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mi>p</mi><mi>q</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>m</mi><mi>n</mi></mfrac><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>p</mi><mi>n</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>m</mi><mi>q</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-153">\frac{p}{q}=\frac{m}{n}\Rightarrow pn-mq=0</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 63</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>যদি একটি ত্রিমাত্রিক রেখা&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-154-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>x</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2278" style="width: 0.71em;                                                 <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-161-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>60</mn></mrow><mi>o</mi></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2316" style="width: 1.733em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.414em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1001.41em, 2.325em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2317"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2318"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.414em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.19em, 1000.96em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2319"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2320"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2321" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">60</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.415em; left: 1.004em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2322" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>60</mn></mrow><mi>o</mi></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-161">{60}^o </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-162-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>30</mn></mrow><mi>o</mi></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2323" style="width: 1.733em; top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2324"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2325"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.414em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.19em, 1000.96em, 4.146em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2326"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2327"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2328" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">30</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.415em; left: 1.004em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2329" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>30</mn></mrow><mi>o</mi></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-162">{30}^o </script></span></p>
</label>
                                                
                                            </div>
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-163-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mn>245</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mn>260</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mn>2</mn><mi>z</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2330" style="width: 13.363em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.945em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1010.86em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2331"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2332" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2333" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2334" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2335" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">245</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2336"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2337"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2338" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2339" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2340" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2341" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2342" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2343" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">260</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2344"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2345"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2346" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2347" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2348" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2349" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2350" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2351" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2352" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">z<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2353" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2354" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mn>245</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mn>260</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mn>2</mn><mi>z</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-163">cos245°+cos260°+cos2z=1</script></span>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-164-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>z</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>z</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>60</mn></mrow><mi>o</mi></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2355" style="width: 10.33em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.445em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1008.45em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2356"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2357" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2358" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.764em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.31em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2359" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">cos</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 1.355em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2360" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2361"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2362" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2363"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2364" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">z<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2365" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2366" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2367" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2368" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2369" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2370" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">z<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2371" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2372" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-2373"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2374"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2375" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">60</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2376" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>z</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>∴</mo><mi>z</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mn>60</mn></mrow><mi>o</mi></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-164">\Rightarrow\cos^2{z=\frac{1}{4}}\therefore z={60}^o</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 64</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-165-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>m</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi>m</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>6</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2377" style="width: 10.061em;                                 </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-167-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>|</mo><mtable rowspacing=&quot;4pt&quot; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-168-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2459" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2460"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2461" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-168">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;ক্ষেত্রফল&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-169-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>18</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2462" style="width: 5.863em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.797em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1004.76em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2463"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2464" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-2465" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2466" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2468" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2469" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">18</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2470" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; </span>
                                    </div>

                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 65</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-170-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2472" style="width: 2.684em;                                     <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
                                        <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                                            <div class="input-group-prepend">
                                                <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p>8 একক</p>
</label>

                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-172-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow><msqrt><msup><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>4</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>10</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2492" style="width: 8.65em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-173-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2520" style="width: 0.658em; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-174-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2523" style="width: 5.125em;                         <div class="row questionBlock">

                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 66</span></div>

                                                <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-177-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2563" style="width: 11.705em; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2568" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2569" style="padding-left: 0.23em;"><span style="display: inline-block;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-180-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>s</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>r</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>r</mi><mi>s</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2614" style="width: 20.084em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 16.436em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1016.39em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2615"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2616" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2617" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2618" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2619" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2620" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2621" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2622" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2623" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2624" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2625" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2626" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2627" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2628" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2629" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2630" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2631" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2632" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2633" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2634" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">6</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2635" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2636" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2637" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2638" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2639" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2640" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2641" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2642" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2643" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2644" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2645" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2646" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2647" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2648" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>s</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>r</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>r</mi><mi>s</mi><mi>i</mi><mi>n</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-180">r=6cos\theta-2sin\theta\Rightarrow r^2-6rcos\theta+2rsin\theta=0</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-181-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2649" style="width: 10.412em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.527em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1008.49em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2650"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2651" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2652" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2653" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2654" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2655" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-2656" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2657" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2658" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2659" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2660" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">6</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2661" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2662" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2663" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2664" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2665" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2666" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-181">\therefore x^2+y^2-6x+2y=0</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 67</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>একটি চতুর্ভুজের চারটি বাহুর সমীকরণ যথাক্রমে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-182-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2667" style="width: 10.769em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.832em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1008.79em, 2.573em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2668"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2669" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2670" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2671" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">0</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2672" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2673" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2674" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2675" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2676" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2677" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">5</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2678" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2679" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2680" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2681" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2682" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2683" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.263em;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-182">y=0\ ,\ y=5\ ,\ y=x</script></span>&nbsp;এবং&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-183-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2684" style="width: 5.032em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.1em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1004.06em, 2.573em, -999.998em); height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2687" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2688" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.263em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2689" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2690" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">4</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.316em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-183">y=x-4</script></span>&nbsp;হলে, চতুর্ভুজটির ক্ষেত্রফল কত একক?</p>

                                    <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 151px; height: 125px;"></p>

<p>চতুর্ভূজটি একটি সামান্তরিক, যার ভূমি 4&nbsp;এবং উচ্চতা 5&nbsp;একক।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-184-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2691" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2692"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2693" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-184">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;সামান্তরিকটির ক্ষেত্রফল&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-185-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>20</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2694" style="width: 5.617em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.592em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1004.55em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2695"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2696" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2697" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2698" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2699" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2700" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2701" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">20</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>20</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-185">=4\times5=20</script></span>&nbsp;বর্গ একক&nbsp;</p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
