                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 68</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-186-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2206;</mo><mi>A</mi><mi>B</mi><mi>C</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2702" style="width: 3.802em; top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2744"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2745" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">B</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2746" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-190-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>A</mi><mi>B</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2750" style="width: 1.865em;                                         <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>

padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2839" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2840" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2843" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2844" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2845" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2846" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2847"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2848" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">17</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2849" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2850" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2851" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2852" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>A</mi><mo>≡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>x</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>y</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>11</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>17</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-196">A\equiv\left(x_3+x_2-x_1,\ y_3+y_2-y_1\right)=\left(1+11+5,\ -2+2-3\right)=\left(17,-3\right)</script></span></p>
</span>
                                    </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>

</span>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row questionBlock">

                            <div class="row question">
                                <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                                    <div class="row">
                                        <div class="serial"><span>Question 70</span></div>
                                        <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                                            <p>কোনো রেখা&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-200-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2921" style="width: 2.684em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.2em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1002.09em, 2.61em, -999.998em); overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.32em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-200">\left(3,8\right)</script></span>&nbsp;বিন্দুগামী এবং&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-201-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>y</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2930" style="width: 7.118em;                                     <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
                                        <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
                                        <br>
                                        <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-207-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x2026;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>i</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x2026;</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi>i</mi><mi>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3003" style="width: 19.305em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.822em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1015.74em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3004"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3005" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3006" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3007" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3008" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.207em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3009" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3010" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3011" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3012" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3013" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">…</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3014" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3015" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3016" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3017" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3018" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3019" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">3</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3020" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3021" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3022" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3023" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">y<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3024" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3025" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">9</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3026" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3027" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3028" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">…</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3029" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3030" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-3031" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">i</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3032" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>…</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>i</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>;</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>…</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>i</mi><mi>i</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-207">2y-x-4=0\ldots\left(i\right);3x-5y+9=0\ldots(ii)</script></span></p>

<p>Solving (i) &amp; (ii), ছেদবিন্দু&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-208-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>3</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3033" style="width: 2.215em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.805em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1001.72em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3034"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3035" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3036" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3037" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3038" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3039" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>3</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-208">(2,3)</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-209-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3040" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-3041"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3042" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-209">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;নির্ণেয় সরলরেখা,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-210-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>8</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>10</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3043" style="width: 16.6em; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3046" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3047" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3053" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0.002em;"></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-3067" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3068" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">10</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.547em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.702em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>8</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>10</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-210">y-3=\frac{8-3}{3-2}\left(x-2\right)\Rightarrow y-3=5x-10</script></span>&nbsp;</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-211-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-3074" style="width: 7.625em;             <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-77-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-930" style="width: 6.895em;             </div>

    <div class="row questionOptions">

                    <span class="input-group-text">A</span>

                <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                    <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-78-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-945" style="width: 6.605em; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.369em; left: 0.549em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-949" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-950" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.23em;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-951" style="padding-left: 0.23em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.959em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.463em, 1000.5em, 4.328em, -999.998em); top: -4.005em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-952" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.369em; left: 0.549em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-953" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.01em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-954" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.276em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-955" style="padding-left: 0.276em;"><span style="display: inline-block; </label>
                    <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">

        <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
            <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
            <br>
            <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-82-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>2</mn><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-987" style="width: 24.305em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1036" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1037" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1038" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1039" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1040" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>2</mn><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mo>−</mo><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁡</mo><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-82">\rm r^2cos\ 2\theta=a^2\Rightarrow r^2\left(\cos^2{\theta}-\sin^2{\theta}\right)=a^2\Rightarrow x^2-y^2=a^2 </script></span></p>
</span>
        </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

<div class="row question">
    <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
        <div class="row">
            <div class="serial"><span>Question 73</span></div>
            <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 6.273em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 6.805em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.748em, 1001.03em, 4.797em, -999.998em); top: -4.137em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1020.86em, 4.223em, -999.998em); top: -2.211em; left: 0em;"><span class="mspace" id="MathJax-Span-1101" style="height: 0em; vertical-align: 0em; width: 0em; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;"></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1102" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1103" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1104" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1105" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">9</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1106" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1107" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">6</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1108" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1109" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1110" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1111" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1112" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1113" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1114" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">16</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1115" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1116" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">36</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1117" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1118" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">12</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1119" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1120" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1121" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1122" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1123" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1124" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1125" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1126" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1127" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">7</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.141em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -2.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 3.952em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msqrt><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>6</mn><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt><mspace linebreak="newline"></mspace><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>16</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>36</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>12</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-85">\rm \sqrt{{(2-1)}^2+\left(3-k\right)^2}=\sqrt{{(5-1)}^2+\left(6-k\right)^2} \\
\Rightarrow1+9-6k+k^2=16+36-12k+k^2\therefore k=7 </script></span></p>
</span>
        </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

        </div>
    </div>
        <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
            <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
            <br>
            <span style="color: black !important;"><p>ভরকেন্দ্র&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-92-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mfrac><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2261;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1190" style="width: 10.822em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.855em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1008.77em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.047em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1191"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1192"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1193" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1194"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1195"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.297em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1002.13em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.064em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1196"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1197" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1198" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1199" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1200" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1201" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1202" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.3em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.297em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1203" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1204" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1205" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1206"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.297em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1002.13em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.064em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1207"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1208" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1209" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1210" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1211" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1212" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1213" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.3em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.297em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1214" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1215" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">≡</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1216" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1217" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1218"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1219" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1220" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1221" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1222" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1223" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.051em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mfrac><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>≡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-92">\rm \left(\frac{0+0+6}{3}\ ,\ \frac{0+3+0}{3}\right)\equiv\left(2,\ 1\right)</script></span></p>

<p>সুতরাং মূলবিন্দুগামী মধ্যমা&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-93-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1224" style="width: 7.297em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.986em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1005.99em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1225"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1226" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1227" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1228" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1229" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1230" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1231" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1232" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1233" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1234" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1235" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1236" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>∴</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-93">\rm y=\frac{1}{2}x\therefore x=2y</script></span></p>
</span>
        </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

<div class="row question">
    <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
        <div class="row">
            <div class="serial"><span>Question 75</span></div>
            <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-94-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>q</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>12</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1237" style="width: 9.056em; </label>
                    
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
            <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                <div class="input-group-prepend">
                    <span class="input-group-text">C</span>
                </div>
                <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                    <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-98-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1269" style="width: 0.731em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.594em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.642em, 1000.59em, 2.325em, -999.998em); top: -2.184em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1270"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1271" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">π<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.002em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.188em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.669em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>π</mi></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-98">\pi </script></span></p>

                    <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
            <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                <div class="input-group-prepend">
                    <span class="input-group-text" style="font-weight:bold;">D</span>
                </div>
                <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                    <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-99-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi>&amp;#x03C0;</mi><mn>6</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1272" style="width: 1.004em;     </div>
        <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
            <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
            <br>
            <span style="color: black !important;"><p>প্রদত্ত রেখাদ্বয় সমান্তরাল,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-100-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>,</mo><mn>180</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1277" style="width: 5.248em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.305em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1004.14em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1278"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1279" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1280" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1281" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1282"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1283"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1284" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1285" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1286" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">180</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1287"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1288"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1289" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow><mo>,</mo><mn>180</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-100">\rm \theta=0°,180°</script></span></p>
</span>
        </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

<div class="row question">
    <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
        <div class="row">
            <div class="serial"><span>Question 76</span></div>
            <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                <p>বর্গের দুটি বাহুর সমীকরণ <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-101-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1290" style="width: 8.906em;                     <span class="fas fa-check"></span>

<div class="row questionBlock">

<div class="row question">
    <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
        <div class="row">
            <div class="serial"><span>Question 77</span></div>
            <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                <p>একটি চলমান বিন্দু &nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-110-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1387" style="width: 5.032em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.1em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1004.06em, 2.535em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1388"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1389" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1390" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1391" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1392" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1393" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.27em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-110">\rm x-y=0</script></span> রেখা এবং&nbsp;(1, 1) বিন্দু থেকে সমদূরত্ব বজায় রেখে চলে। এর সঞ্চারপথের সমীকরণ কোনটি?</p>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

        <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
            <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
            <br>
            <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-115-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>|</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi></mrow><msqrt><msup><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt></mfrac><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1476" style="width: 13.977em; <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-116-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1517" style="width: 18.732em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 15.33em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1015.29em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1518"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1519" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1520" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1521" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1522" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1523" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1524" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1530" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1531" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1532" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1533"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1543" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1544" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1545" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-116">\rm \Rightarrow x^2-2xy+y^2=2x^2+2y^2-4x-4y+4</script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-117-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1549" style="width: 14.797em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.133em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1012.09em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1550"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1551" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1552" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1553" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1554" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1555" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1556" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1557" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1558" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1559" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1560" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1561" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1562" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1563" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1564" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1565" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1566" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1567" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1568" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1569" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1570" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1571" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1572" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-117">\rm \therefore x^2+y^2+2xy-4x-4y+4=0</script></span></p>
</span>
        </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

<div class="row question">
    <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
        <div class="row">
            <div class="serial"><span>Question 78</span></div>
            <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                <p>কোনো রম্বসের একটি কর্ণের প্রান্ত বিন্দু দুইটির স্থানাঙ্ক <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-118-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1573" style="width: 4.51em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.69em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1003.58em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1574"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1575"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1576" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1577"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1578" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1579" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1580" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;         <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
            <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
            <br>
            <span style="color: black !important;"><p>কর্ণদ্বয়ের ছেদ বিন্দু&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-124-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2261;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1629" style="width: 10.207em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.363em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.518em, 1008.2em, 3.568em, -999.998em); top: -2.785em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1630"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1631"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1632" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1633"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1634"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.23em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1635"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1636" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1637" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1638" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1639" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1640" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1641" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -0.9em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1642"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1643" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1644" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1645" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1646" style="font-size: 70.7%; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.03em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.027em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1658" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1659" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; <p>কর্ণটির ঢাল&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-125-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1663" style="width: 5.904em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.838em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1004.76em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1664"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1665" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1666" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.928em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.23em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1667"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1668" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1669" style="font-size: 70.7%; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.76em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.9em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1671"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1672" style="font-size: 70.7%; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1678" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.547em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.752em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-125">\rm =\frac{5+4}{-6-3}=-1</script></span></p>

<p>অপর কর্ণের ঢাল = 1&nbsp;[<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-126-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2235;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1679" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1680"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1681" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∵</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∵</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-126">\because</script></span> কর্ণদ্বয় পরস্পর লম্ব] ;&nbsp;</p>

<p>অপর কর্ণের সমীকরণ,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-127-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1682" style="width: 14.92em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.215em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1012.17em, 2.666em, -999.998em); font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1689" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1690" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1691" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1692" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1693"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1694" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1695" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1696" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1697" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1703" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1704" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1705" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1706" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; </span>
        </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

<div class="row question">
    <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
        <div class="row">
            <div class="serial"><span>Question 79</span></div>
            <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                <p>অক্ষদ্বয় হতে বিপরীত চিহ্নবিশিষ্ট সমান মানের অংশ ছেদ করে এবং <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-128-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1708" style="width: 3.02em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.461em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1002.35em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1709"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1710"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1711" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1712"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1713" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1714" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1715" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1716" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1717" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.32em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-128">\left(3,\ 5\right)</script></span> বিন্দুগামী সরলরেখা-</p>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionOptions">
        <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
            <div class="input-group" style="align-items: center;">
                <div class="input-group-prepend">
                    <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                </div>
                <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                    <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-129-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1718" style="width: 7.197em;                     <span class="fas fa-check"></span>
