        <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
            <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
            <br>
            <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-133-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1754" style="width: 20.576em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 16.846em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1016.8em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1755"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1756"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1757" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1758" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1759" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1760" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.37em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1761" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1762" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1763" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1764" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1765" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1766" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1767" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1768" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1769" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1770" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1771" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1772" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1773" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1774" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1775" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1776" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1777" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1778" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1779" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1780" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1781" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-133">\rm \frac{x}{a}-\frac{y}{a}=1\Rightarrow x-y=a\Rightarrow3-5=a\Rightarrow a=-2 </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-134-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1782" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1783"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1784" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>∴</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-134">\therefore</script></span>&nbsp;রেখা:&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-135-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1785" style="width: 5.822em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.756em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1004.72em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1786"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1787" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1788" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1789" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1790" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1791" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1792" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1793" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-135">\rm x-y+2=0</script></span>&nbsp;</p>
</span>
        </div>

<div class="row questionBlock">

<div class="row question">
    <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
        <div class="row">
            <div class="serial"><span>Question 80</span></div>
            <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-136-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1794" style="width: 3.02em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.461em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1002.35em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1795"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1796"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1797" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1798"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1799" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1800" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1801" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;         <div class="row">
            <div class="serial"><span>Question 81</span></div>

    <div class="row questionOptions">
        <div class="col-sm-12 row questionOption">
            <div class="input-group " style="align-items: center;">
                <div class="input-group-prepend">
                    <span class="input-group-text">A</span>
                </div>
                <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                    <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-69-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>90</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1053" style="width: 1.869em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.505em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1001.37em, 2.37em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1054"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1055" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">90</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1056"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1057"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1058" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.053em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.003em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>90</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-69">90° </script></span></p>

        <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
            <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
            <br>
            <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-73-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1077" style="width: 14.674em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.01em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1011.93em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1078"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1079"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1080" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1081" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1082" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1083" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1084"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1086" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1087" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1088" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1089" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1090" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1094" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1095" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1096" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1097" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1098" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1099" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1100"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.273em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.82em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1101" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1102" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1103" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1104" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1105" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mo>;</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>∴</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-73">\rm m_1=-\frac{2}{3}\ ;m_2=\frac{3}{2}\therefore m_1m_2=-1 </script></span></p>
</span>
        </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

<div class="row question">
    <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
        <div class="row">
            <div class="serial"><span>Question 82</span></div>
            <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                <p>মূলবিন্দু থেকে কোনো সরলরেখার ওপর অঙ্কিত লম্ব x-অক্ষের ধনাত্মক দিকের সাথে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-74-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>45</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1106" style="width: 1.827em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.492em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1001.34em, 2.386em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1107"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1108" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">45</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1109"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1110"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1111" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.089em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>45</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-74">45°</script></span> কোণ উৎপন্ন করে। সরলরেখাটি (1,3) বিন্দুগামী হলে এটি অক্ষদ্বয়ের সাথে কত বর্গ একক ক্ষেত্রফলের ত্রিভুজ গঠন করে?</p>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

        <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
            <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
            <br>
            <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-75-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>45</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mn>45</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mo>;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1112" style="width: 10.248em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.404em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1008.32em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1113"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1114" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1115" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1116" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1117" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1118" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1119" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">45</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1120"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1121"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1122" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1123" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; </script></span></p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-78-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1164" style="width: 0.658em; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1199" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1200" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1201" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-1202"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1203"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1204" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.49em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1205"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1000.29em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1206" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1207" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1208" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1209" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">(</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-1210"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1211"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1212" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.49em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1213"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1000.29em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1214" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1215" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1216" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1217" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">8</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.547em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mn>45</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi><mn>45</mn><mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD"><mo>°</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><msup><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>×</mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><msup><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-79">\rm =\frac{1}{2}\times \frac{p}{cos45°}×\frac{p}{sin45°}=\frac{1}{2}×(2\sqrt2)^2×(\sqrt2)^2=8</script></span></p>
</span>
        </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

    <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
        <div class="row">
            <div class="serial"><span>Question 83</span></div>

    </div>
        <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
            <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
            <br>
            <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-86-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1255" style="width: 18.199em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 14.92em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1014.92em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1256"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1257"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1258" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1259" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1260" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1261" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1262" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1263" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1264" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1265" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.404em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1002.87em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1266"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1267" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1268"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1269" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1270" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1271" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1272" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.953em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1273" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1274" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1275" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1276" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1277" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1278" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1279" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1280" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1281" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1282" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1283" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1284" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1285" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1286" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1287" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1288" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.702em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-86">\rm a^2=1^2+\left(a-2\right)^2=a^2-4a+5\Rightarrow a=\frac{5}{4} </script></span></p>
</span>
        </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="row questionBlock">

<div class="row question">
    <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
        <div class="row">
            <div class="serial"><span>Question 84</span></div>
            <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">

                <div class="input-group-append questionTable">
                    <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-92-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1350" style="width: 3.053em;         <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">

        <div class="row">
            <div class="serial"><span>Question 85</span></div>
            <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                <p>একটি ট্রাপিজিয়ামের দুটি বাহুর সমীকরণ <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-94-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1417" style="width: 8.906em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.304em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.455em, 1007.27em, 2.535em, -999.998em); overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.27em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.184em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-94">\rm 4x+3y+10=0</script></span> ও <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit;         <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
            <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
            <br>
            <span style="color: black !important;"><p>প্রদত্ত সমীকরণদ্বয় ট্রাপিজিয়ামের সমান্তরালে বাহুদ্বয়কে নির্দেশ করে।</p>

<p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-96-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>10</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><msqrt><msup><mn>4</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt></mfrac><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>6</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>9</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mn>6</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1439" style="width: 16.928em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.855em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.641em, 1013.81em, 3.855em, -999.998em); top: -2.99em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1440"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1441" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1442" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; </span>
        </div>

</div>

                    <label style="margin-left:5px;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-101-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>4</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1516" style="width: 2.735em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.234em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.368em, 1002.14em, 2.598em, -999.998em); top: -2.229em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1517"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1518" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1519" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1520" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1521" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.184em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1522" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.234em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.331em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.336em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>4</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-101">(3,4) </script></span></p>

        </div>
    </div>

<div class="row questionBlock">

<div class="row question">
    <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
        <div class="row">
            <div class="serial"><span>Question 87</span></div>
            <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-102-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>P</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1523" style="width: 4.137em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.392em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1003.28em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1524"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1525" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">P</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1526" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1527" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1528"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1529" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">h</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1530" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1531" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1532" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1533" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.32em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&nbsp;</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-102">\rm P\left(h,\ k\right)</script></span> বিন্দু থেকে x&nbsp;ও y&nbsp;অক্ষের উপর অঙ্কিত লম্ব যথাক্রমে PA&nbsp;ও PB&nbsp;হলে, P&nbsp;বিন্দু দিয়ে যায় এবং AB&nbsp;এর উপর লম্ব এরূপ রেখার সমীকরণ-</p>

            </div>

        <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
            <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
            <br>
            <span style="color: black !important;"><p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 120px; height: 94px;"></p>

<p>AB রেখার সমীকরণ&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-106-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>:</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1581" style="width: 14.223em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.641em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1011.6em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1582"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1583" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">:</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1584" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1585" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1586" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">h</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1587" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1588" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.37em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1589" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1590" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1591" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1592" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1593" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1594" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1595" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1596" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1597" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">h</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1598" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1599" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1600" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">h</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1601" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1602" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1603" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span></nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>:</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi><mo>−</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math></span></span><script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-106">\rm :\frac{x}{h}+\frac{y}{k}=1\Rightarrow kx+hy-hk=0</script></span></p>

<p>AB এর উপর লম্ব রেখার সমীকরণ&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-107-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2236;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1604" style="width: 13.977em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.436em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1011.44em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1605"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1606"><span style="font-family: STIXGeneral, &quot;Arial Unicode MS&quot;, serif; font-size: 82%; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal;">∶</span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1607" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">h</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1608" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1609" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1610" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1611" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1612" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; </span>
        </div>

        <div class="row solveText" style="display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4;">
            <span style="color: black !important; font-weight: bold;">Solution:</span>
            <br>
            <span style="color: black !important;"><p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-114-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>b</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation"><nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1708" style="width: 16.805em;         </div>
